title: Shift Leader Front Office Scandic Kiruna
description:
Mitt i nya Kiruna, intill stadshuset, tornar en av Kirunas mest spännande byggnader upp sig med 231 rum, ett flexibelt möteserbjudande och en storslagen skybar med utsikt mot Kebnikaise i väst.


**Nu söker vi en Shift Leader till Scandic Kiruna.**



Oavsett varför gästen kommer till oss är det få saker som är så uppskattade som ett vänligt ansikte som hälsar välkommen. Som Shift Leader agerar du värd tillsammans med övriga teamet på hotellet och skapar en gästupplevelse i världsklass.



Under din tid hos oss kan dessa områden variera i takt med att du och affären utvecklas. Hos oss får du ta ett stort eget ansvar för att ta de beslut som krävs för att göra gästen nöjd och teamen utvecklar och förbättrar arbetssätt och service i takt med att omvärlden förändras. Vi är nämligen övertygade om att det är när du får utvecklas och bidra med all din kompetens och erfarenhet som vi överträffar gästens förväntningar. På köpet får vi kul på jobbet!



Så ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss – och bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic!


**Vad innebär rollen som Shift Leader Front Office?**



Du som arbetar inom Front Office är ansvarig för att våra gäster får service i världsklass. Du är spindeln i nätet som ser till att gästen alltid är i fokus. Du är den som går igenom ankomstlistan och lägger tid på detaljerna. Du löser det mesta och är en stjärna på att vända en missnöjd gäst till en nöjd gäst. I ansvarsområdet ingår även administrativt arbete, säkerhetsarbete och arbete med försäljning. Arbetet i Front Office innebär att checka in och ut hotellets gäster, hälsa välkommen och ge gästen den information den behöver om sin vistelse. Du hanterar bokningar i systemet Opera Cloud och hanterar administrativa uppgifter runt gäster och säkerhet.



I rollen som Shift Leader har du, förutom att vara en del av driften, den övergripande överblicken över gästflödet och ser tillsammans med teamet till att prioritera arbetsuppgifter så att verksamheten flyter så att gästerna blir nöjda. Du leder och fördelar arbetet och hanterar bemanningen under ditt arbetspass. Vid behov får du utbilda nya medarbetare på hotellet och du avlastar också Front Office Manager med vissa administrativa arbetsuppgifter.



Hotellet har öppet dygnet runt och det är därför viktigt att du trivs med att arbeta i skift (förmiddagar, eftermiddagar och helger).


**Din kompetens**



För den här rollen krävs att du har både förmåga och vilja att arbeta med ett driftsnära ledarskap. Du är trygg i ditt ledarskap och har både integritet och säljdriv. För att passa i rollen tror vi också att du har en väl utvecklad social förmåga och är kapabel att hantera att det händer många olika saker samtidigt. Det är mycket viktigt att du kan förmedla ett gott värdskap till hotellets gäster. Du är en lyhörd och prestigelös lagspelare som tar ett stort ansvar för dina arbetsuppgifter och helhetsresultatet.



Du har också vana och kunskap i att arbeta med dator som arbetsredskap.



Eftersom arbetet till stor del består av att kommunicera med gäster är goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska en förutsättning. Talar du ytterligare ett språk är det meriterande.


**Information om tjänsten:**



Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid.


Startdatum 1 september


Vi tar enbart emot ansökningar via vår hemsida. Alla ansökningar kommer att behandlas löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag, varför vi ber dig att ansöka så snart som möjligt. I denna rekrytering använder vi oss av ett enklare test om service vid urvalet.



Vi ser fram emot att välkomna dig till oss på Scandic!


Ps. på vår hemsida kan du läsa mer om vår kultur, vad tjänsten innebär och om våra förmåner!


  
**Vi har riktigt bra förmåner**
-------------------------------

Rabatt när du äter, dricker och övernattar hos oss


Family & Friends rabatt för din familj och vänner


Rabatt hos våra partnerföretag


Pension & försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal


Friskvårdsbidrag


Utbildning och utveckling via interna plattformar


  
Vi når längre när olikheter bejakas. Hos oss får du utrymme att vara dig själv och utvecklas i den riktning du vill, med trygga villkor och schyssta avtal som grund. Ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss - bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic.



Delar du våra värderingar?


**BE A PRO** **BE YOU** **BE CARING** **BE BOLD**

  

  

...uppmuntrar alla att göra skillnad för miljön och att det var en av våra kollegor inom housekeeping som kom på idén om ”häng-upp-handduken”.
...i Sverige blivit rankad som besöksnäringens mest attraktiva arbetsgivare två år i rad, i Visitas årliga undersökning.
... bara serverar kaffe som är ekologiskt och Fairtrade eller UTZ-certifierat.
...tack vare vårt stora miljöengagemang, blivit rankad som branschens mest hållbara arbetsgivare elva år i rad, av Sustainable Brand Index.
...under 2014 inledde ett samarbete med organisationen Real Stars, centrerat kring ”Fair Sex”, dvs. arbete mot människo- och sexhandel.

title: Strategisk Teknisk Rådgivare / Workshopledare med Arkitektkompetens
description:
**Inledning**


Vill du vara med och forma kunders resa mot Kubernetes och Cloud Native redan innan tekniken är vald? Gillar du att leda strategiska diskussioner med CIO:er lika mycket som att djupdyka i teknik med arkitekter, utvecklare och andra tekniska beslutsfattare? Då kan det här vara rollen för dig.


Vi på Conoa söker nu en konsult med en unik kombination av teknisk skärpa och starka *soft skills*. Du kommer att spela en nyckelroll i våra Discovery Workshops och andra inledande uppdrag där kunderna ofta står i startgroparna för sin transformation.


Du arbetar nära tekniken och underhåller din roll som lösningsarkitekt genom att axla uppdrag som till exempel kravarbete, arkitekturkartor och teknisk rådgivning.


**Vad du kommer att göra**


* Planera och facilitera workshops som sätter riktningen för kundens tekniska strategi.
* Kommunicera tydligt med både management och teknik – och skapa samsyn mellan dem.
* Bidra med teknisk rådgivning inom Kubernetes, containers, CI/CD och relaterade teknologier.
* Stötta presale i designval och strategiska överväganden.
* Identifiera affärsmässiga och organisatoriska krav, risker och möjligheter.
* Agera lösningsarkitekt i uppdrag, till exempel kravspecifikationer, designförslag och teknisk dokumentation.
* Skapa och visualisera arkitekturlösningar i form av kartor, modeller eller presentationsmaterial.
* Multitaska mellan flera parallella kunddialoger och uppdrag.
* Samarbeta med våra djupa teknikspecialister där extra spetskompetens behövs.

**Vi tror att du har**


* Gedigen teknisk förståelse för Kubernetes och containerplattformar.
* Erfarenhet av IT-infrastruktur: Linux, automation, CI/CD, säkerhet, hybridmoln.
* Någon form av utvecklingserfarenhet, du kan prata med utvecklare på deras nivå och skapa förståelse för containers.
* Erfarenhet av teknisk arkitektur/designarbete och dokumentation.
* Vana att facilitera workshops med både tekniska och icke-tekniska deltagare.
* En trygg och tydlig kommunikationsstil på svenska och engelska.
* Förmåga att översätta teknik till affärsvärde och tvärtom.

**Extra plus om du också har**


* Konsulterfarenhet från förstudier, analyser eller strategiska initiativ.
* Erfarenhet av plattformsutvärdering, regulatoriska krav (t.ex. ISO27001, NIS2, GDPR) eller audits.
* Bakgrund som arkitekt, senior teknikkonsult eller teknisk projektledare.

**Vem är du?**


Du trivs i gränslandet mellan strategi och teknik. Du gillar att skapa struktur i komplexa diskussioner och tycker det är roligt att få andra att förstå, engagera sig och ta nästa steg. Du vill vara med tidigt, påverka mycket och hjälpa kunder fatta rätt beslut. Samtidigt vill du fortsätta jobba nära tekniken, och bidrar gärna som lösningsarkitekt i praktiska uppdrag mellan workshopinsatser.


**Om Conoa**


Conoa grundades 2012 med en stark övertygelse om att Linux och Open Source-baserade lösningar är grundbultar i modern infrastruktur. Vårt mål var att bygga ett starkt teknikfokuserat företag med en företagskultur som främjar kompetensutveckling för att ständigt vara relevanta och hjälpa företag in i nya IT-miljöer.


2015 inleddes vår satsning inom Container-teknologi då vi blev första partner i Europa till Docker. Resan fortsatte med viktiga roller i stora kundprojekt, och att vi som första bolag i Sverige utsågs till både Kubernetes Certified Service Provider (KCSP) och Kubernetes Training Partner (KTP). Under dessa år har vi växt fram som en av Sveriges främsta specialister inom Kubernetes, Cloud Native och Container-teknologi.


Vi har förmånen att ha ett 30-tal av Sveriges främsta specialister som medarbetare och vi hjälper några av Sveriges ledande företag att implementera modern Cloud Native infrastruktur.


Sedan april 2021 är vi en del av Proact. Genom samgåendet får vi ännu större möjlighet att utvecklas som specialister, samt att bredda våra tjänster och geografiska närvaro.


**Vi är på en spännande tillväxtresa, hör av dig!**


  
Avdelning
IT
Platser
Stockholm
Distansarbete
Hybridarbete

title: Senior Product Safety Engineer
description:
Senior Product Safety Engineer


Swedium Global Services is the growing System Engineering and Solution Company, offers services like Semiconductor Engineering R&D Services, Embedded Systems Development, Custom Application Software Development, Web and Cloud Application Development, Testing Services, Consultancy and Outsourcing services to our clients across the globe for an onsite and offshore business model. Swedium Global is having presence in Sweden, Finland, Poland, Czech Republic and in India.


Job Name:


Location: Onsite


Job Name: Senior Product Safety Developer


Requirements  

* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Robotics, or related field.
* 5+ years of experience in embedded software development, with at least 2 years focused on safety-critical systems.
* Strong skills in C++ for real-time and embedded applications.
* Solid knowledge of functional safety principles and implementation in industrial robotics.
* Hands-on experience with safety standards such as: ISO 13849, IEC 61508, ISO 10218, and knowledge of the Machinery Directive.
* Experience with safety development tools and processes (e.g., static code analysis, unit test-ing frameworks, traceability tools).
* Excellent problem-solving, documentation, and communication skills.

  
Job Overview


* Location : Vasteras, Sweden
* Vacancy : 1
* Key Skills : C++, RTOS, 13849 /IEC 61508 /ISO 10218

title: Prime Named Account Executive - Mulesoft - Sweden
description:
*To get the best candidate experience, please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating efforts.*

Job Category


Sales
Job Details


**About Salesforce**

We’re Salesforce, the Customer Company, inspiring the future of business with AI+ Data +CRM. Leading with our core values, we help companies across every industry blaze new trails and connect with customers in a whole new way. And, we empower you to be a Trailblazer, too — driving your performance and career growth, charting new paths, and improving the state of the world. If you believe in business as the greatest platform for change and in companies doing well and doing good – you’ve come to the right place.


**We're Salesforce** , t he Customer Company, inspiring the future of business with AI+ Data +CRM. Leading with our core values, we help companies across every industry blaze new trails and connect with customers in a whole new way. And, we empower you to be a Trailblazer, too — driving your performance and career growth, charting new paths, and improving the state of the world. If you believe in business as the greatest platform for change and in companies doing well *and* doing good– you’ve come to the right place.


**Role description**

An opportunity has been created for a **Sr.** **Account Executive** **- Mulesoft** to join the enterprise sales team. The role will focus on driving expansion in your local market in Sweden. This is an outstanding career opportunity for a sales professional looking to further their career in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.


**What you will be doing**

* Proactively identify, qualify and close a sales pipeline
* Strategically prospect into CTOs/CIO`s, Engineering/IT Leaders, and business executives
* Build strong and effective relationships, resulting in growth opportunities
* Partner with our Solution Architects and work closely with the Professional Services team to achieve customer satisfaction
* Work closely with the enterprise ecosystem partner sales and channel partner to maximize deal sizes
* Participate in our sales enablement training, sophisticated sales training, and leadership and development programs

**What you will bring to the table**

* 10+ years of field experience in quota-carrying experience in a fast-paced and competitive market in Sweden
* Develop a strategy for prioritizing, targeting, and closing critical opportunities in assigned territory
* A proven track record of overachievement and hitting sales targets
* Ability to articulate the business value of complex enterprise technology
* Skilled in building business and technical champions
* Driven and competitive. Possess a strong desire to be successful
* Fluent in English and Swedish + Right to Work in Sweden.

**Things we love to see in your application**

* Passionate about growing your career in a market leader
* Previous Sales Methodology training (e.g. MEDDIC, SPIN, Challenger Sales)
* Familiarity with integration, API develops and automation technology

**MuleSof** **t** is on a mission to connect the world’s applications, data and devices. $593B is spent each year connecting applications, data and devices, and the challenge is growing spectacularly with the explosion of cloud, big data, mobile and the Internet of Things. We’re “productizing” integration - making it as easy to connect systems and companies as it is to communicate with friends on Social Media. MuleSoft’s Anypoint Platform™ enables companies to unlock the full potential of their applications and data through API-led connectivity, both on-premises and in the cloud, and our growth continues to accelerate. Our platform is used by organizations in over 60 countries, from emerging companies to Global 500 enterprises including Mastercard, Unilever, Tesla, Intuit, BSkyB and Verizon among others. We’re building a great company filled with outstanding people who challenge and encourage each other. MuleSoft is recognized as a Deloitte Technology Fast 500 company and 2015 Best Place to Work by Glassdoor.


**Benefits & Perks**

Check out our benefits site which explains our various benefits, including well-being reimbursement, generous parental leave, adoption assistance, fertility benefits, and more


**Accommodations**

If you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Form .


Accommodations


If you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Form .


Posting Statement


Salesforce is an equal opportunity employer and maintains a policy of non-discrimination with all employees and applicants for employment. What does that mean exactly? It means that at Salesforce, we believe in equality for all. And we believe we can lead the path to equality in part by creating a workplace that’s inclusive, and free from discrimination. Know your rights: workplace discrimination is illegal. Any employee or potential employee will be assessed on the basis of merit, competence and qualifications – without regard to race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender expression or identity, transgender status, age, disability, veteran or marital status, political viewpoint, or other classifications protected by law. This policy applies to current and prospective employees, no matter where they are in their Salesforce employment journey. It also applies to recruiting, hiring, job assignment, compensation, promotion, benefits, training, assessment of job performance, discipline, termination, and everything in between. Recruiting, hiring, and promotion decisions at Salesforce are fair and based on merit. The same goes for compensation, benefits, promotions, transfers, reduction in workforce, recall, training, and education.

title: Säljare till Telesales!
description:
Vi söker fler engagerade kollegor till vårt Telesales-team som är en del av Internal Sales Channels och en av de största avdelningarna på Tre. Här arbetar vi med att ta hand om våra befintliga kunder, genom att förstå deras behov, skapa värde och erbjuda lösningar som gör det enkelt och smart att vara kund hos oss.
  
  

Om rollen
  
  

Hos oss är Telesales mer än bara samtal - det är en plats för att växa, bygga relationer och skapa kundupplevelser som sticker ut. I den här rollen arbetar du med utgående samtal till våra befintliga kunder. Du lyssnar in, guidar och hjälper kunden att hitta rätt lösning. Du får även möjlighet att ta emot inkommande samtal från kunder som är nyfikna på våra erbjudanden.
  
  

Kundfokuserad försäljning är grunden i allt vi gör. Varje samtal bygger på service, lyhördhet och en vilja att hitta rätt lösning för kunden. Försäljning hos oss handlar om att bygga relationer, skapa förtroende och guida kunden till ett beslut som känns rätt.
  
  

Du blir en del av ett team med stark sammanhållning, där våra Säljcoacher finns nära till hands för att stötta dig i din utveckling och hjälpa dig nå dina mål. Här firar vi framgångar tillsammans och peppar varandra att bli bättre varje dag. Vårt mål är att du ska nå dina mål!
  
  

Vi erbjuder dig
  
  

En gedigen introduktion och utvecklingsmöjligheter, bland annat en unik utbildning och certifiering i kommunikationsmetodiken Customer Excellence Program.
  
En tillsvidareanställning på heltid med fast grundlön och provision utan tak.
  
En kultur vi är mycket stolta över, där tävlingar, aktiviteter och gemenskap är en självklar del av vardagen.
  
Att vara en del av en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser enligt Great Place To Work och vi är stolta samarbetspartner till Women in Tech och Tjejer Kodar.
  
Några av våra medarbetare
  
Julia Maxén
  
Gruppchef
  
"Jag vill att mitt team ska få de bästa förutsättningarna för att göra sitt jobb på bästa sätt. Det är så vi utvecklar oss som team, men även utvecklar Tre framåt."
  
Henrik Sundvall
  
Digital projektledare
  
"Det absolut bästa med att vara projektledare på Tre är jag får jobba brett med kollegor från alla delar av organisationen och få lära mig nya saker varje dag. Jag har friheten att vara mig själv – och bli uppskattad för det!"
  
Jayasri Battola
  
Utvecklare
  
"The great work culture and the technology made me choose Tre. Working alongside great people in mixed team setups, with both experienced and new talents, along with the latest and greatest tools and technologies like Cloud and Azure."
  
  

Mer om dig
  
  

Vi tror att du är någon som trivs med att ta kontakt, skapa dialog och bygga relation. Du har energi, ett tydligt driv och ser möjligheter där andra kanske tvekar. Du är modig, du räds inte att gillar att jobba mot mål och tycker om att se resultat av ditt arbete.
  
  

Har du tidigare erfarenhet av kundservice eller försäljning är det ett plus, men det är inte avgörande. För oss är det viktigare vem du är än vad du gjort tidigare, vi ser till att du får med dig all kunskap och de verktyg du behöver för att lyckas.
  
  

Lite praktisk information
  
  

Arbetstiderna är måndag till fredag, 09.00–18.00 (fredagar till 17.00).
  
Du behöver vara över 18 år och kunna prata och skriva obehindrat på svenska och engelska.
  
Tjänsten är på heltid med start i höst.
  
Vi arbetar från vårt fina 3hus vid Globenområdet, Stockholm.
  
  

Välkommen med din ansökan!
  
  

Låter det här som något för dig? Vad roligt, vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
  
  

Att söka jobbet är enkelt och går snabbt. Du behöver bara besvara några urvalsfrågor direkt i annonsen, inget personligt brev behövs. För att ge alla samma chans att visa sin potential använder vi tester som första steg i rekryteringsprocessen.
  
  

Tjänsten är på heltid med start i höst. Urval och intervjuer kommer främst att ske i början av augusti, men vi kikar löpande i mån av tid - så vänta inte med din ansökan!
  
  

För våra slutkandidater genomför vi en bakgrundskontroll. Du får mer information om detta under rekryteringsprocessen.
  
  

Varmt välkommen till oss på Tre!
  
  

Vi har riktigt bra förmåner
  
  

Friskvårdsbidrag, föräldrarlön, pension & försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal
  
  

Flexibla helgdagar och fem dagar extra ledigt per år
  
  

Hundzon & gym i 3huset
  
  

Subventionerad lunch
  
  

Förmånliga rabatter på cyklar, kollektivtrafik och elbilar
  
  

Generösa bonusmodeller eller provisioner
  
  

Vi drivs av att hela tiden försöka göra saker bättre, på nya och annorlunda sätt. Vi ser oss själva som en avgörande del av Sveriges samhällsstruktur, eftersom vi vet att pålitlig uppkoppling är en viktig grundsten i dagens digitala värld.
  
  

Tre föddes som utmanare och är en organisation i ständig rörelse. Vi strävar efter att vara i framkant i allt vi gör. Vi är övertygade om att det är människorna och kulturen på Tre som är avgörande för vår utveckling.
  
  

När du startar din resa på Tre finns det oändliga möjligheter att växa och utvecklas med oss.
  
  

WE THINK LIKE CHALLENGERS - I en föränderlig värld, är vi på Tre nyfikna och ständigt öppna för nya lösningar. På Tre anpassar vi vägen framåt allt eftersom vi provar och lär oss vad som funkar bäst.
  
  

WE WORK LIKE CHAMPIONS - På Tre gör vi alltid vårt bästa. Vi känner ägandeskap för vår uppgift, sätter tydliga mål och håller fokus på det som gör mest nytta för affären.
  
  

WE ACT LIKE BUDDIES - På Tre är vi schyssta kollegor. Vi samarbetar med varandra över team och funktioner, vi bollar idéer, ger och tar emot feedback.
  
  

2003
  
Tre först i Sverige med videosamtal och strömning av mobil video. Att se personen som du ringer upp i ögonen är en helt ny upplevelse vid den här tidpunkten.
  
  

2006
  
Tre lanserar mobilt bredband som tredje operatör i världen. Under de kommande fem åren vinner Tre pris för Sveriges snabbaste mobila bredband.
  
  

2013
  
Tre’s systerbolag Hallon startas med en vision att vara den enkla mobiloperatören utan onödigt krångel.
  
  

2019
  
Ett händelserikt år! 3Världen lanseras som innebär att kunder kan surfa i 80 länder till samma pris som inom Sverige. Därefter lanseras 3Samla som gör att alla kunder kan lägga till fler användare till sitt abonnemang och sist men inte minst är Tre först i Sverige med ett lansera ett publikt 5G-nät.
  
  

2025
  
Tele2 Arena byter från 1 januari namn till 3Arena. Med vår starka passion för innovation, uppkoppling och upplevelser ska vi medverka till arenans och områdets utveckling.
  
  

Alexander Malm | Kontaktperson

title: L2 Analyst - Escalation & Platform Specialist
description:
**Do you want to be at the forefront of protecting our society against cyber threats? We are looking for a****n L2 Analyst – Escalation & Platform Specialist to team up with the most dedicated team of cyber specialists in our Managed Security Services.**

**About Truesec – A Leading Cybersecurity Company**


Since 2005, Truesec has been a native cybersecurity company, driven by one single purpose: Creating safety and sustainability in a digital world by preventing cyber breach and minimizing impact.


Over the years, we’ve earned the trust of organizations worldwide and gained a strong reputation internationally. Our team consists of dedicated specialists covering the entire spectrum of cybersecurity – with capabilities in Predict, Prevent, Protect, Respond, and Recover.


Today, we employ around 300 employees – and as cybercrime grows, we need to grow. To support that goal, we are now looking for an L2 Analyst – Escalation & Platform Specialist**,** who wants to make a difference in our Managed Security Services business unit.


**The Role**


As a member of our Detection Solutions team, you’ll take on a hybrid role that combines technical platform ownership, escalation-level analysis, and internal enablement. You’ll play a crucial part in ensuring our EDR platforms are not only running smoothly, but are also leveraged to their fullest potential by the entire SOC team. In this role, you will:


* Act as a technical platform specialist for Palo Alto Cortex, SentinelOne, and Carbon Black.
* Continuously monitor, assess, and communicate updates and new features from our EDR vendors to ensure our detection capabilities remain cutting-edge.
* Enable and educate - sharing your expertise by keeping SOC analysts up to date on the latest platform developments, detection opportunities, and best practices. Translate complex updates into actionable guidance and ensure knowledge is embedded in our processes.
* Support and mentor SOC analysts during escalations, acting as the second line of defence in complex investigations.
* Work closely with platform vendors, engineering teams, and internal stakeholders to troubleshoot issues, optimize deployments and increase detection capabilities, representing the Detection Solutions team with clarity and credibility.

Drive ongoing enhancements across our detection tooling and processes, ensuring that new platform capabilities are rapidly and effectively integrated.  

* 

**Your Potential Background**


We are looking for someone with a passion for cybersecurity, a strong sense of product ownership, and a collaborative mindset. You thrive in a dynamic environment, are eager to stay current with the latest technologies, and enjoy sharing your expertise with others. You have 2-5 years of hands-on experience in cybersecurity, ideally within a SOC environment or a similar operational role.


**Required Skills:**


* Familiarity with EDR platforms, particularly advantageous if it’s Palo Alto Cortex XDR, SentinelOne, or Carbon Black.
* A good understanding of the difference in operational context between cloud-native vs. on-premises EDR tools.
* A strong interest in product ownership, with a proactive approach to learning and staying current with evolving platform features and best practices.
* Ability to communicate complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences.
* Collaborative and outgoing personality; comfortable representing the team in cross-functional meetings, vendor calls, and technical customer discussions.
* Self-motivated, with a proven ability to work independently and take ownership of responsibilities.
* Bonus points if you have experience writing detection rules or working with API integrations in EDR platforms.

Due to the sensitivity in our assignments, we require Swedish citizenship, citizenship in an EU country, or a Swedish work permit.


**Join Our Mission Toward a Safe Digital Future**


If you truly want to make a difference and make our world a little bit safer, this is the place for you. At Truesec, you’ll get to be at the forefront of fighting cybercrime instead of reading about it in the news. This is your chance to be part of an exciting journey in a leading cybersecurity company – and learn from some of the best in their field.


So, are you ready to team up with the most dedicated team of experts and be part of a meaningful mission? Then we are excited to get to know you!

title: Senior Applied Scientist / RSDE
description:
Microsoft is a company where passionate innovators come to collaborate, envision what can be and take their careers further. This is a world of more possibilities, more innovation, more openness, and the sky is the limit thinking in a cloud-enabled world.  

  

Microsoft’s Azure Data engineering team is leading the transformation of analytics in the world of data with products like databases, data integration, big data analytics, messaging & real-time analytics, and business intelligence. The products our portfolio include Microsoft Fabric, Azure SQL DB, Azure Cosmos DB, Azure PostgreSQL, Azure Data Factory, Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure Service Bus, Azure Event Grid, and Power BI. Our mission is to build the data platform for the age of AI, powering a new class of data-first applications and driving a data culture.  

In particular, we are hiring a Senior Applied Scientist for the Gray Systems Lab (GSL), an applied research group part of the Azure Data CTO office. GSL tackles interesting challenges in both open-source and proprietary technologies related to analytics, cloud, AI, and storage systems among others. We build reliable, highly scalable and highly performing distributed systems for data analytics on Azure, we publish in top-conferences and are actively involved in open-source projects. GSL researchers and engineers have contributed hundreds of academic papers and build technologies that impacted tens of millions of dollars of Microsoft revenues/costs. We work on novel technologies including analytics on GPUs, container technologies, graph databases, infrastructure and models for LLMs and data-science, machine learning for systems, and many other areas. With team members originating from 10 countries and 4 continents, each of us brings something authentically unique to the team. In this diverse and inclusive environment, creativity, open dialogue, and a healthy work-life balance are powering GSL innovation and helping each of us grow.  

  

We do not just value differences or different perspectives. We seek them out and invite them in so we can tap into the collective power of everyone in the company. As a result, our customers are better served.**Responsibilities**
--------------------


Establishes collaborative relationships with relevant product and business groups inside or outside of Microsoft and provides expertise or technology to create business impact. Takes initiative and drives activities such as technology transfers attempts, standards organizations, filing patents, authoring white papers, developing or maintaining tools/services for internal Microsoft use, or consulting for product or business groups. May publish research to promote receiving new intellectual property for business impact.  

  

Brings new technology and approaches into production by applying long-term research efforts to solve immediate product needs. Collaborates with and bridges the gap between researchers (in community across the company, Microsoft Research [MSR], or in their own organizations) and development teams. Begins to negotiate across teams to ensure cutting edge technology is being applied to products in a practical way that meets key business objectives. Develops an understanding of research approaches used across a group or organization to leverage (and not re-invent) solutions.  

  

Independently works to create product impact. Identifies approach, and applies, improves, or creates a research-backed solution (e.g., novel, data driven, scalable, extendable) to positively impact a Microsoft product or service. Designs an approach to solve significant business problems shared by a senior team member. May publish research to promote receiving new intellectual property for product impact.  

  

Serves as an expert within product domain. Gains deep knowledge in a complex or highly ambiguous service, platform, or domain. Shares knowledge of changes in industry trends and advances in applied technologies with engineers and product teams to apply advanced concepts to identify product needs and drive action toward solutions. Fosters audience for the product based on understanding of the industry.  

  

Reviews business and product requirements and incorporates state-of-the-art research or previously tested solutions occurring at Microsoft and the academic field to formulate plans that will meet business goals. Identifies problems and develops strategy to resolve team or feature level problems. Provides strategic direction for the kinds of data used to solve problems.  

  

Embody our culture and values**Qualifications**
------------------

* Bachelor's Degree in Statistics, Econometrics, Computer Science, Electrical or Computer Engineering, or a related field with relevant experience in areas such as statistics, predictive analytics, or research.
* Master's Degree in Statistics, Econometrics, Computer Science, Electrical or Computer Engineering, or a related field with relevant experience in areas such as statistics, predictive analytics, or research.
* Doctorate in Statistics, Econometrics, Computer Science, Electrical or Computer Engineering, or a related field with relevant experience in areas such as statistics, predictive analytics, or research.

 **Other Requirements*** Ability to meet Microsoft, customer, and/or government security screening requirements for this role. These requirements include, but are not limited to, the following specialized security screenings: Microsoft Cloud Background Check.
* This position will be required to pass the Microsoft Cloud background check upon hire/transfer and every two years thereafter.

**Preferred/Additional Qualifications*** Master's Degree in Statistics, Econometrics, Computer Science, Electrical or Computer Engineering, or a related field with extensive experience in areas such as statistics, predictive analytics, or research.
* Doctorate in Statistics, Econometrics, Computer Science, Electrical or Computer Engineering, or a related field with significant experience in areas such as statistics, predictive analytics, or research.
* Equivalent experience in relevant fields.
* Proven experience creating publications (e.g., patents, libraries, peer-reviewed academic papers).
* Experience presenting at conferences or other events in the outside research/industry community as an invited speaker.
* Demonstrated experience conducting research as part of a research program in academic or industry settings.
* Experience developing and deploying live production systems as part of a product team.
* Experience developing and deploying products or systems at multiple points in the product cycle from ideation to shipping.

title: Sales Account Manager - Stockholm, Sweden
description:
About the Job:
The Red Hat Sales team is looking for a Sales Account Manager with experience selling high-tech offerings and services to join us in Stockholm, Sweden. In this role, you will work to increase Red Hat's market share and revenue. You'll be a key part of our Field Sales team, working within a defined territory or industry vertical. You'll build new relationships and expand and improve business with existing customers. In addition, you'll be responsible for all aspects of the sale, including pricing negotiations, contract development, and order fulfillment. As a Sales Account Manager, you will also manage internal associates, including sales engineering support and technical support. You'll need to be comfortable working with partner sales and services teams and with information technology (IT) and business executives, using your extensive experience developing and implementing sales plans. Candidates with experience selling cloud technology offerings are preferred.
What you will do:* Sell Red Hat's offerings and services in your assigned territory or industry
* Meet quantitative and qualitative performance goals and set high standards for articulation and presentation of key messages and the Red Hat value proposition
* Create strategic and tactical sales plans and guide the extended sales team in implementing them to maximize revenue and growth
* Meet assigned sales quotas by acquiring new customer accounts and renewing and growing existing relationships
* Call on prospective customers, providing technical and administrative information, demonstrations, and price quotes for our offerings
* Accurately forecast and close sales in alignment with company goals

  

What you will bring:* 7+ years of sales management experience with a demonstrated record of success, preferably in the software or IT industry
* Bachelor's degree, preferably in business, marketing, or other technical discipline
* Solutions sales mentality in an environment with multiple offerings and services; experience with cloud, virtualization, middleware, and emerging technologies is a plus
* Solid understanding of the complete sales cycle management from prospecting to closing
* Ability to work as part of a dynamic team while demonstrating flexibility and initiative
* Excellent communication skills with fluency in Swedish and English


#LI-MR3
About Red Hat
Red Hat is the world’s leading provider of enterprise open source software solutions, using a community-powered approach to deliver high-performing Linux, cloud, container, and Kubernetes technologies. Spread across 40+ countries, our associates work flexibly across work environments, from in-office, to office-flex, to fully remote, depending on the requirements of their role. Red Hatters are encouraged to bring their best ideas, no matter their title or tenure. We're a leader in open source because of our open and inclusive environment. We hire creative, passionate people ready to contribute their ideas, help solve complex problems, and make an impact.
Inclusion at Red Hat  

Red Hat’s culture is built on the open source principles of transparency, collaboration, and inclusion, where the best ideas can come from anywhere and anyone. When this is realized, it empowers people from different backgrounds, perspectives, and experiences to come together to share ideas, challenge the status quo, and drive innovation. Our aspiration is that everyone experiences this culture with equal opportunity and access, and that all voices are not only heard but also celebrated. We hope you will join our celebration, and we welcome and encourage applicants from all the beautiful dimensions that compose our global village.
Equal Opportunity Policy (EEO)  

Red Hat is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and an affirmative action employer. We review applications for employment without regard to their race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, age, veteran status, genetic information, physical or mental disability, medical condition, marital status, or any other basis prohibited by law.  

Red Hat does not seek or accept unsolicited resumes or CVs from recruitment agencies. We are not responsible for, and will not pay, any fees, commissions, or any other payment related to unsolicited resumes or CVs except as required in a written contract between Red Hat and the recruitment agency or party requesting payment of a fee.  

Red Hat supports individuals with disabilities and provides reasonable accommodations to job applicants. If you need assistance completing our online job application, email application-assistance@redhat.com. General inquiries, such as those regarding the status of a job application, will not receive a reply.

title: BIM coordinator within the energy sector
description:
Did you recently graduated with a degree in engineering and want to work with BIM. We are looking for a BIM coordinator with an interest in handling different projects.


As a BIM coordinator, you will assess architectural, structural, and mechanical design models. You will check the quality and accuracy of the models, extract quantities, identify and resolve clashes, analyze costs, and develop documentation and representations. You will also be required to construct and maintain 3D/4D/5D/6D Building Information Models on occasion.

 **Main responsibilities**

  

* Manage and assist in the coordination efforts of all parties involved in the project including owners, architects/engineers, consultants, sub-contractors
* Derive BIM modeling requirements and guidelines from contract requirements and for BIM use throughout the lifecycle
* Support project team by managing and creating content library files and templates, creating and enforcing standards and evaluating project models.
* Act as the main point of contact for BIM technology and any related issues between the construction managers, subcontractors, owners, design team, and others as required.

**Desired qualifications:**


As a person you are not afraid to take initiative. You need to get people to collaborate. You generate information from others that you then manage, repackage, and utilize. Engage in discussions with suppliers, keep your head held high, and have the courage to set demands.

  

* You have a strong mindset and are able to lead large scale coordination meetings
* Good knowledge of BIM related platforms such as BIM360/Autodesk Construction Cloud and thorough understanding of BIM processes and global BIM standards
* Minimum of a Bachelor’s Degree within a related field
* Interest in 3D Modeling in the relevant tools and experience from BIM, Model and Data coordination.
* Fluency in English and strong analytical skills, excellent writing, and communication skills with experience of C-level business discussion


It is meritorious if you are fluent in Swedish, both spoken and written.

 **Being a consultant at Nexer Tech Talent**


Nexer Tech Talent specialize in giving young tech talents the ultimate start in their careers. For this role, you will be employed by Nexer Tech Talent but work at client, located in either Ludvika or Västerås, start within summer.


You will be coached by a mentor at the client and by a consultant manager at Nexer Tech Talent. As a consultant, you will be well taken care of. We often invite our consultants to group activities such as lectures, after works and lunch meetings. After successful completion of the consulting assignment, the intention is that you will be offered employment with client.


**Application**


Does this sound like you? We are constantly screening resumes, therefore please submit your application as soon as possible. If you have any questions, you are welcome to contact Tech Recruiter Lema Naderi at lema.naderi@nexergroup.com


We are looking forward to hearing from you!

**About Nexer Tech Talent**

*Nexer Tech Talent is part of the Nexer Group – a tech company with deep roots in Swedish entrepreneurship and innovation. Together, we are over 2500 employees in 15 countries who, for more than 35 years, have helped our clients stay ahead strategically, technologically, and communicatively. Learn more about Nexer Tech Talent* *here**.*

title: Financial Controller Nordic
description:
**About Ingram Micro**  

Ingram Micro is a leading technology company for the global information technology ecosystem. With the ability to reach nearly 90% of the global population, we play a vital role in the worldwide IT sales channel, bringing products and services from technology manufacturers and cloud providers to business-to-business technology experts. Our market reach, diverse solutions and services portfolio, and digital platform Ingram Micro Xvantage™ set us apart. Learn more at www.ingrammicro.com.


SCOPE & PURPOSE:

* Newly created role, offering the opportunity to shape the future direction of the Finance team, and broader organisation.
* Own all aspects of enhancing and ensuring compliance with a robust financial control environment
* Oversee the timely reporting of accurate and complete financial results.
* Working hand in hand with the F, P&A team to develop insights for decision making and process improvement


PRINCIPAL TASKS OF JOB / CORE RESPONSIBILITIES:

* Oversee the timely reporting of accurate and complete financial results consistent with Ingram Micro accounting policies and in compliance with US GAAP requirements for 4 legal entities (Sweden, Denmark, Finland and Norway).
* Take ownership of the overall financial control environment, including the relationship with General Ledger activities undertaken by our offshored shared service centre.
* Act as End-to-end process owner for processes impacting our financials, including the design of, and ongoing application of relevant controls.
* Consulting with corporate controllership on technical US GAAP matters.
* Oversee accurate and timely tax submissions (detailed VAT and CIT work undertaken by relevant SME’s).
* Oversee the Group and local Statutory Audits (4 legal entities), including owning the relationship with external auditors.
* Acting as senior member of the Finance leadership team, work with F,P&A team to develop a suite of reporting that facilitates meaningful business insights and enhanced decision making.
* Autonomously respond to ad-hoc queries from Regional and Global finance functions.


PRIMARY COMPETENCIES:


Innovation

* Proficient in identifying problems, analysing them and finding effective solutions.
* Leading initiatives and influencing others to embrace and participate.


Judgement and Decision Making

* Capable of independent thinking and able to work proactively and autonomously.
* Strategic thinker.
* Offer own conclusions and recommend actions based on findings.
* Well-developed analytical skills: proven ability to set up and critically evaluate reporting and relevant KPI’s


Communication and Collaboration

* Good communication and presentation skills. Able to simplify complex arguments in both verbal and written communication.

Influence and relationship building

* Ability to work cross-functionally, building strong relationships while challenging the status quo.
* Influence change and enhancements to current working practices to improve efficiency.


Planning and Organising

* Able to review current workload and prioritise accordingly, ensuring that deadlines are met.
* Works to ensure tasks and activities are completed efficiently and effectively for stakeholders.


Accountability

* Must be results oriented and take full ownership of identified issues.


You would need to have experience from:

* "The Big 4" qualified
* Good understanding of US GAAP
* Good understanding of Nordic local accounting and tax regulations
* Over five years’ experience in Senior Finance control position
* ERP implementation
* Auktoriserad revisor or Godkänd revisor


You would need to fluency in English. Fluency in Swedish and any other Nordic language is meriting.

title: Partner Development Manager
description:
**Position Summary**  

As Partner Development Manager (PDM) for AWS at Ingram Micro Nordics, your primary focus will be to identify, recruit, and activate new AWS resellers across the Nordic region. You will drive the expansion of our partner ecosystem by targeting high-potential Cloud players and onboard them into Ingram Micro’s AWS framework. Beyond acquisition, you will work with selected partners to build strategic growth plans, support go-to-market alignment, and accelerate AWS adoption.
  

  

**Key responsibilities**

* Identify, recruit, and onboard new AWS-focused resellers aligned with Ingram Micro’s strategic growth goals.
* Build tailored development plans for each partner — aligned to AWS growth frameworks, co-sell readiness, and specialization opportunities.
* Lead quarterly business reviews (QBRs) to track partner progress against KPIs (revenue, certifications, GTM activations).
* Guide partners through AWS programs such as MAP, OLA, WAFR, and credits — ensuring full leverage of available benefits.
* Act as the strategic liaison between AWS, Ingram Micro, and the partner — ensuring alignment and visibility across all motions.
* Collaborate with technical teams to support partner enablement, customer engagements, and solution-led sales.
* Support marketing activations and co-funded campaigns to build partner brand and generate AWS pipeline.
* Track partner activity in CRM and internal dashboards, ensuring clean visibility into pipeline, programs, and progression.
* Serve as the voice of the partner internally, influencing go-to-market, program design, and execution.
  

**What you bring to the role**  

Seasoned professional individual contributor. Works independently with limited supervision. Will champion significant projects, programs and business initiatives using demonstrated creativity and ingenuity and may also manage projects/processes. Coaches and reviews the work of lower level professionals. Problems faced are difficult and often complex. Influences others regarding policies, practices and procedures.  



**Skills and Experience**

* 3–5 years in partner development, channel sales, or cloud ecosystem roles — ideally with AWS exposure.
* Strong understanding of cloud business models, AWS partner frameworks, and the Nordic reseller landscape.
* Proven ability to manage partner relationships, build strategic plans, and drive execution across teams.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills; fluent in English and Swedish (other Nordic language is a plus).
* Familiarity with AWS tools, certifications, and program dynamics (MAP, AWS Partner Network) is beneficial.
* Experience from working with CRM tools (e.g., Salesforce), partner tracking, and performance dashboards.

**About Ingram Micro**  

Ingram Micro is a leading technology company for the global information technology ecosystem. With the ability to reach nearly 90% of the global population, we play a vital role in the worldwide IT sales channel, bringing products and services from technology manufacturers and cloud providers to business-to-business technology experts. Our market reach, diverse solutions and services portfolio, and digital platform Ingram Micro Xvantage™ set us apart. Learn more at www.ingrammicro.com.

title: Solution Architect for API Solutions | SEB, Stockholm
description:
Shape the future of SEB's API platform as our next Solution Architect!
   

  

 SEB is a leading northern European financial services group, and at the same time, one of the largest IT employers in the Nordics. Banking is changing rapidly, and we are proud of our reputation for being entrepreneurial and innovative in the face of change. Our brilliant techies work hard to future proof SEB’s digital architecture and customer products because it genuinely makes a huge impact for our customers and colleagues. Does that sound like a fit for you? About the role: As a Solution Architect in the API area, you’ll play a crucial role in building our API-driven platform and governance. You will contribute to the transformation of our API platforms, a highly prioritized area, ensuring seamless integrations for both our internal and external customers.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Lead the architectural work within the API area.
* Mentor and guide development teams in adopting API standards and practices.
* Coordinate the architecture change agenda for API solutions in the Business Infrastructure domain.
* Support various API transition initiatives with your expertise and experience.
* Act as an advisor to stakeholders on both the business and technology sides.
* Drive innovation by designing scalable and secure API solutions.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align API strategies with business goals.
* Ensure the reliability and performance of API services through best practices and continuous improvement.
* Influence the future direction of our API strategies.


**To Thrive In This Role We Believe You Have**
* Experience in architecture within the API domain.
* Hands-on experience working with APIs and API platforms.
* Ability to model, visualize, and communicate architectural solutions across various technologies and platforms.
* Familiarity with modern development paradigms such as event-driven architecture, microservices, and cloud.
* Excellent communication skills, bridging both business and IT.
* Previous experience in the financial industry is a plus.
* Proficiency in English.


**Bonus Points For Experience With**
* DevOps and Continuous Delivery.
* Microservices architecture and REST APIs.
* Authentication protocols like OpenID Connect (OIDC) and OAuth.


**Ready to join?**
 Attach your CV and a personal letter describing yourself and how you can contribute to this role. Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than January 30th, 2025. If you have questions about the position, please contact hiring manager Lars Lindgren lars.lindgren@seb.se (we will not process applications via email)
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB here:** 
 www.sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.

title: Solution Architect Fixed Income for the Trading Technology Area at SEB in Stockholm
description:
*SEB is more than just a bank with an IT function. We are a progressive tech company powered by innovation and fueled by collaboration. From Java to AI and everything in between, we offer you an impressive tech stack and several technology paths. Together we're innovating for a sustainable society and building the tech arena of the future, a welcoming space for everyone.*
 Do you want to be part of strengthening SEB's market position in Fixed Income? We're currently looking for a Solution Architect to join our team. By joining Fixed Income, you'll become part of a leading player in the Fixed Income space within the Nordics, offering a broad product portfolio for investors, including interest-bearing instruments and associated derivatives, advisory services, and comprehensive financial solutions.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a Solution Architect within Technology Trading, you will be part of a team accountable for driving SEB's architectural agenda for Fixed Income. Your responsibility will be to evolve the architecture in line with the business objectives for Fixed Income with a focus on Cloud, Data, API and Security. You will be responsible for the driving the strategic agenda for the application portfolio, designing solutions, providing options, and detailing roadmaps towards the architectural target state.
   

  

 The architecture team within Trading consists of Solution Architects led by a Domain Architect. Together we strive to have a broad range of competencies and skills in technologies and business domain knowledge. We like to collaborate and team up to do great things together.
   

  

 But that’s not all – you’ll also be part of the Fixed Income Tribe, which includes teams from Trading Technology and Trading Services, all working together to support the Fixed Income business.
   

  

**To Thrive In This Role, We Believe You Have**
* Experience in designing architectures that integrate diverse technologies and platforms
* Broad interest in various architecture domains, including business, application, information, and technology
* Expertise in designing and developing systems, with a focus on APIs, modularity, TTD, and data
* Experience working with regulations and directives
* Proven stakeholder management and communication skills, both with business and IT
* Strong drive, proactive attitude, and ability to take ownership and execute
* Strategic mindset with experience in developing roadmaps to guide the transition to target architectures
* Experience in cyber security and security architecture is merited
* Fluency in English


**What We Offer**
* Extensive training and learning opportunities
* Attractive compensation and benefits
* Access to SEB staff banking with exclusive benefits
* Opportunities to help transform an industry
* Chances to make an impact on social or environmental issues
* Agile and modern ways of working
* Deliver world-class service to customers


**Do you want to be part of SEB?**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today via the link in this ad, but no later than
 **June 30th, 2025** 
 . If you have questions about the position, please contact Andreas Höjgård, andreas.hojgard@seb.se ,
 **but we will not process applications via email.**
 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and criminal records checks. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB** 
 on our Career website or through our Career podcasts.
   

  

 https://sebgroup.com/career

title: Digital Transformation & E-Government Specialist
description:

**Location:** 
 Europe (remote/on-site as needed)

 Up to 12 months

 Short-term assignments / task-based consultancy

 We are creating a pool of Digital Transformation & E-Government Specialists for a new FWC Contract:
 **EC-SG REFORM/2025/OP/0001: Provision of consultancy services to support the design, development, implementation, monitoring and evaluation of structural reforms in EU Member State.**
