title: Solutions Architect- IPaas
description:
Solution Architect - iPaaS
 



  





 Define and drive iPaaS architecture – Establish the reference architecture, best practices, and architectural guidelines.
 



  





 Develop operational guidelines for iPaaS platform usage – Establish standardized ways of working with the iPaaS platform. Define and implement best practices for using iPaaS platform. Define processes around provisioning the platform.
 



  





 Lead architectural discussions – Guide engineers and architects in designing scalable and efficient iPaaS-based integration solutions.
 



  





 Act as an iPaaS ambassador – Enable business units to effectively leverage iPaaS by providing guidance and fostering adoption.
 



  





 EDI and File transfer capabilities in iPaaS – Drive EDI and file-based integration solutions using iPaaS.
 



  





 Identification of overlapping capabilities – Validate existing capabilities from other tools over the iPaaS capabilities and ensure duplicate tools do not exist for similar capabilities. Define long term strategic goals to achieve this.
 



  





 Collaborate with segment architects – Gather requirements, align with architectural directions, and communicate these effectively to the team.
 



  





 Support technical roadmap and planning – Assist the Digital Product Owner (DPO) in defining the technical roadmap and delivery plans, balancing short-term needs with long-term vision.
 



  





 Translate high-level requirements into actionable work items – Clearly define purpose, scope, and expected outcomes for development tasks.
 



  





 Ensure alignment with enterprise architecture principles – Secure adherence to the North Star architecture and ensure compliance with security directives and policies.
 



  





  





  





 Technical Skills:
 



  





 · Strong experience in integration implementation and architecture
 



 · Hands-on experience in implementing processes/workflows/recipes/integration flows from scratch using any industry leader iPaaS platform, with expertise in configuration of connectors for major CRM platform, spend management systems, REST enabled SaaS solutions, event platforms etc.
 



 · Sound knowledge on the data mapping, transformation, data enrichment needs and implementation of same in the appointed iPaaS platform.
 



 · Should have knowledge around at least one iPaaS specific scripting like Java scripting, Groovy, Python, Ruby etc.
 



 · Good understanding around how the iPaaS platform cost is driven, how to manage the performance of the platform etc.
 



 · Sound knowledge around security, isolations, compliance related topics in iPaaS platform.
 



 · Expertise in designing and implementing integration architectures.
 



 · High level understanding of API-led integration architecture.
 



 · Familiarity with Observability tools such as OpenTelemetry and Splunk.
 



 · Experience working in Agile environments, with a strong understanding of Agile methodologies. Knowledge of SAFe agile methodologies is advantageous.
 



 · Prior experience as part of a central integration team, enabling integration products and defining processes and methodologies for product adoption.

title: Senior Consultant
description:
*Vill du vara med och driva arbetet inom molntjänster och IT-infrastruktur?
   

  

 På Advania hjälper vi våra kunder att modernisera sina IT-miljöer, optimera leveransen och skapa säkra, skalbara IT-lösningar. Här får du möjlighet att arbeta i ett team av experter och vidareutveckla din kompetens i samarbete med andra specialister.*
 Senior Consultant på Advania 🚀
   

  

 Som Senior Consultant hos oss spelar du en central roll i att initiera, implementera och förvalta moderna IT-lösningar som möter kundernas verksamhetsbehov.
   

  

**Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter inkluderar:**
* Teknisk rådgivning för ett antal kunder med fokus på säkerhet och proaktivitet.
* Design och implementering av tekniska lösningar on-prem och i cloud.
* Drift och utveckling av centrala servermiljöer och managerade tjänster.


**Du ansvarar även för att:**
* Äga och driva mindre förbättringsprojekt för nya och befintliga tjänster mot kund.
* Förbereda, leda och handleda workshops med kund som teknisk rådgivare.


 Rollen är baserad i Solna och du rapporterar till Head of Delivery Teams. Teamet som du ingår i består av ett mindre team på 4-6 personer och är en del av en större grupp med bred specialistkompetens inom exempelvis Nätverk, Windows Server, Klient, Microsoft SQL och Microsoft 365. Du samarbetar nära andra konsulter samt med våra sälj- och projektteam.
   

  

 Vad som gör denna roll unik⭐
   

  

 Det här är en roll för dig som vill arbeta i en teknisk miljö där din expertis inom Microsofts plattformar verkligen kommer till sin rätt. Du får möjlighet att arbeta med avancerade molnprojekt, samarbeta med andra specialister och kontinuerligt fördjupa din specialistkunskap. Här finns stora möjligheter att påverka och driva innovation tillsammans med våra kunder och likasinnade kollegor.
   

  

 Vad vi söker hos dig ✨
   

  

 För att du ska trivas och lyckas hos oss söker vi dig med en bakgrund inom konsultrollen och tydligt affärsfokus. Du arbetar idag som Technical Account Manager eller tekniskt ansvarig och trivs i en roll där teknik och kundfokus möts.
   

  

 Du är ansvarstagande, har ett starkt driv och en entreprenöriell ådra. Du motiveras av att hjälpa kunder att förverkliga sina verksamhetsbehov och att driva tekniken framåt.
   

  

 Hos oss får du arbeta i team där laget går före jaget. Din vardag kommer i stor utsträckning att handla om att lösa problem tillsammans, i en miljö där du använder din specialistkunskap för att skapa verkligt kundvärde.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som har:**
* Som har erfarenhet av Microsofts infrastruktur, med fokus på servermiljöer och Azure.
* Certifiering inom AZ-104 Azure Administrator Associate eller AZ-800 Administering Windows Server Hybrid Core Infrastructure är meriterande.
* Erfarenhet av MSP-branschen är meriterande.


 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan! 👋
   

  

 Visa gärna ditt intresse så snart som möjligt då vi intervjuar löpande. Vi välkomnar sökanden med olika bakgrunder, erfarenheter och synsätt, eftersom vi vet att en bredare mångfald berikar var och en av oss och stärker såväl effektivitet som kreativitet i vårt arbete.
   

  

 Som en del av vår rekryteringsprocess genomgår våra slutkandidater en obligatorisk bakgrundskontroll, en för oss kvalitativ kontroll inför ett anställningsbeslut. Advania samarbetar även med Ljung & Sjöberg för en proaktiv arbetsplats kopplat till alkohol och droger.
   

  

 Tveka inte att höra av dig om du har några frågor eller funderingar.

title: Physical Security Architect
description:
**Hiring: Physical Security Architect – Data Center Solutions | Stockholm, Sweden** 




  





 We are seeking a skilled
 **Physical Security Architect** 
 to join a rapidly expanding team within a leading Nordic group operating in the data center infrastructure space. The company focuses on innovative engineering, construction, and operational support for next-gen data centers across Northern Europe.
 



 In this full-time role based in
 **Stockholm** 
 , you’ll be embedded in one of their group companies working on a
 **cutting-edge physical security product** 
 specifically designed for hyperscale data center environments. You will contribute across the full project lifecycle—from early client engagement to solution design, system implementation, and long-term technical support.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Develop tailored physical security systems that integrate access control, surveillance, biometric ID, and perimeter security.
* Translate client requirements into robust, scalable system architectures aligned with industry standards.
* Support technical pre-sales efforts, working alongside sales and engineering teams to craft compelling solutions.
* Produce detailed system layouts and schematics using CAD or related tools.
* Oversee or assist in on-site system deployment, testing, and handover.
* Collaborate closely across departments from bid phase through to execution.
* Stay informed about advancements like AI surveillance, drones, and Lidar, and advise on their integration into evolving security strategies.



  





**Requirements** 



* Degree in Electrical Engineering, Security Systems, Computer Science, or similar—equivalent experience also considered.
* Solid experience in the design and deployment of advanced physical security systems.
* Working knowledge of systems such as
 **Milestone, Lenel, Axis, Bosch, Morpho, Dormakaba** 
 , etc.
* CAD proficiency and a hands-on approach to project execution.
* Excellent communication skills with the ability to interface with clients and contribute to business growth.



**What’s On Offer** 



* Competitive salary with pension benefits.
* Dynamic role in one of Europe’s fastest-growing industries.
* Chance to work on large-scale data center projects setting industry benchmarks.
* A platform for professional growth within a forward-thinking, technology-driven environment.



  





 If you're passionate about physical security technology and thrive in a cross-functional, high-impact role—this is your chance to make your mark in a booming sector.

title: Talent Sourcer
description:
In 1996 Nordnet redefined the financial world as the first digital bank in Europe. Now, we're set to do it again, with the goal of creating the next generation bank in the cloud. Watch a short introduction to Nordnet, which describes our identity.
   

  

 Are you ready to dive into an exciting journey at a pioneering, forward-thinking company, where autonomy in your role is paramount?
   

  

 We're seeking a passionate Talent Sourcer to join us in shaping the future of Nordnet!
   

  

**Your role**
 As a Talent Sourcer, you will work on various aspects of the recruitment process on a daily basis, with a focus on sourcing and candidate experience. You will team up with a Talent Acqusition Partner working closely with each other in the recruitment processes to ensure good collaboration, quality and speed. Your main responsibilities will be to build candidate pipelines and develop a deep understanding of the candidate market, while also supporting all parts of the recruitment process.
   

  

 You will be responsible for sourcing active and passive talents, acting as a sourcing subject matter expert, presenting meaningful market updates and building out strong diverse talent pipelines. The ideal candidate will lead strategic sourcing initiatives, streamlining and improving our recruitment processes to ensure best practices in a fast-paced rapidly growing environment.
   

  

 You will join us at an exciting stage as Nordnet is in the midst of a very exciting phase, where you will play a crucial role and see the results of your efforts. The emphasis of the role lies within recruitment, and you will closely collaborate with our Talent Acquisition Partners, hiring managers, and other stakeholders.
   

  

 You will also be involved in planning and executing special Employer Branding events, both at and outside of Nordnet's offices, with the aim of increasing Nordnet's attractiveness as an employer.
   

  

**Your background**
 We are looking for someone passionate about recruitment. You have a keen interest in the tech industry and digitalization, and enjoy building a network. You have excellent skills in both Swedish and English and an interest in search and other sourcing methods.
   

  

 We are looking for someone with a big interest in developing within the Talent Acquisition and sourcing area and it is a merit if you have previous experience from a similar role. This is a perfect opportunity for you who are looking for a challenging role and want to keep on developing within recruitment in general and take a leading role within sourcing in our TA-team.
   

  

 Above all, we are seeking someone driven and eager to develop in their work. You are proactive and have a strong business interest. Furthermore, you are humble and see opportunities rather than problems. Naturally, you enjoy taking initiative and believe that recruitment and tech are the most exciting fields out there.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 We are a team of five vibrant individuals, each brimming with enthusiasm, dedication, and a shared passion for what we do. Together, we form a supportive and upbeat group, always ready to inspire and uplift one another as we tackle challenges and pursue our goals.
   

  

 We offer you the opportunity to establish a solid foundation for further developing your skills in recruitment and talent acquisition.
   

  

 You will work for a flexible employer with short decision-making processes where you, as an individual, can have a significant impact. There's a lot happening on a daily basis, and you thrive best in a dynamic environment.
   

  

 With us, you'll have the opportunity to work in a Nordic environment with a focus on innovation, product development, and technology. We accelerate, renew ourselves, and build the best platform for savings and investments. Our ambitions are high, and you will be part of an exciting and challenging journey with a wonderful team of sharp, committed and dedicated colleagues.
   

  

 We are 900 employees in Stockholm, Oslo, Helsinki, and Copenhagen.
   

  

 More information about Nordnet is available on our company website and in our employer branding movie.
   

  

 Visit us also at: www.nordnet.se, www.nordnet.no, www.nordnet.dk, and www.nordnet.fi.
   

  

**Questions & applications**
 Apply today! – Please note that we do only accept applications through our recruitment system, hence no email applications will be considered.
   

  

 Due to summer vacation we will start to review applications in the beginning of August and will get back to you with feedback as soon as possible.
   

  

 If you have questions, please contact Head of Talent Acquisition, Heidi Ershult heidi.ershult@nordnet.se.
   

  

 We look forward to receiving your application!

title: Data Scientist
description:
Do you want to design cutting-edge AI and ML solutions, work with advanced data models, and empower businesses with innovative analytics?
   

  

 Nexer Insight is looking for a talented Data Scientist to join our team in Stockholm, Malmö, or Gothenburg. We invite you to embark on an exciting journey where you'll work with fascinating clients, tackle varied and challenging tasks, and enjoy exceptional benefits. At Nexer Insight, we are committed to leveraging advanced analytics, machine learning, and AI to drive innovation and deliver impactful solutions for our clients.
   

  

**Nexer Insight**
 Nexer Insight is a company that embodies entrepreneurship and innovation. As a Data Scientist with us, you'll work with cutting-edge technologies, including LLMs (Large Language Models), RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), and advanced AI solutions. We value teamwork, professional growth, and a vibrant community spirit. With us, you'll have the opportunity to work on exciting projects, collaborate with experts in the field, and make a meaningful impact in the intersection of data science and AI.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Develop advanced AI/ML models and design solutions leveraging LLMs for various AI use cases, including RAG and intelligent agents.
* Apply machine learning, statistical methods, and predictive modeling to solve real-world problems.
* Build and deploy data pipelines and cloud-based architectures for ML workloads and MLOps.
* Innovate and collaborate with clients to discover new business opportunities and develop tailored solutions.
* Work with NLP, computer vision, and containerized applications to deliver high-impact projects.
* Leverage platforms like Azure Databricks, Azure Data Lake, and Azure ML for scalable and efficient workflows.
* Promote best practices for data science, from architecture and data quality to reliability and performance.


**Who You Are**
 We expect you to have:
   

  

* Minimum 4 years within Data Science
* Strong understanding of LLMs and experience building solutions on top of them for AI-driven solutions.
* Experience with RAG and AI-driven agents.
* An analytical mindset and strong business acumen.
* Problem-solving aptitude and a proactive mindset.
* Hands-on experience with applied ML, statistics, and cloud architectures for MLOps.
* Proficiency in Python, PySpark, and familiarity with tools like Databricks.
* Knowledge of computer vision, NLP, SQL, and containerized apps.
* Experience with Azure cloud services such as Azure ML and Azure Data Lake.
* Fluency in Swedish and English.


**Why Nexer Insight?**
 At Nexer Insight, we invest in our employees by providing professional development, certifications, and a vibrant working culture. With us, you'll be part of a team pushing boundaries and using advanced data science to create meaningful solutions for leading clients.
   

  

 Are you ready to take the next step in your career and explore the forefront of AI and data science? Apply today and join us on this exciting journey!

title: SAP Engagement Manager
description:
At PBS Nordics, a Capgemini business unit, we empower individuals to shape their careers within a collaborative global community.
   

  

 Specializing in ERP transformation services for both public and private sectors, PBS Nordics delivers tailored solutions using top ERP systems like SAP, Microsoft Dynamics, and IFS. With a strong Nordic presence and a diverse global client portfolio, we guide organizations through seamless ERP transformations, driving operational excellence and strategic growth.
   

  

**Your role**
 As an SAP Engagement Manager, you will be responsible for leading and managing client engagements, ensuring successful delivery of SAP projects, and building strong, long-lasting relationships with our clients.
   

  

 Do you want to make a significant impact and advance your career in a collaborative and innovative environment with well-known customers this could be the role for you!
   

  

*In this role you will play a key role in:*
* Understanding client's needs, aligning project objectives with company goals, and ensuring the successful completion of the project at hand.
* Lead SAP implementation projects from inception to completion, ensuring they are delivered on time, within scope, and within budget.
* Play a central role in building, maintaining and enhancing client relationships and working collaboratively with solution architects and technical consultants for preparing appropriate response to RFP documents.
* Identify and mitigate risks associated with project delivery, ensuring smooth execution and client satisfaction.


**Your profile**
* Minimum 10 years of experience in SAP project management with good delivery or pre-sales background having demonstrated experience in managing projects.
* Strong understanding of SAP solutions and proven ability to manage complex projects, lead cross-functional teams and ability to respond to RFP and estimation capabilities.
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to interact effectively with clients and team members.


*Note: Nordic-based and fluency in English; proficiency in Swedish is preferred. Open to travel.*
**What We Believe You Will Enjoy About Working Here**
* A challenging career in a vibrant environment with access to extensive training, a global network of experts and an innovative culture that promotes learning, growth, and shared success.
* Opportunities to work on real-world problems and help transform leading organizations.
* A company culture driven by core values: Honesty, Trust, Freedom, Team Spirit, Modesty, Fun, and Boldness.
* A strong commitment to inclusion, diversity, and supporting the whole person.


**Application**
*In this recruitment process, we review applications and hire on an ongoing basis. As part of our recruitment process, identity verification and background checks may occasionally be conducted.*
**About Capgemini**
 Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries.
   

  

 With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2024 global revenues of €22.1 billion.
   

  

**Get The Future You Want** 
 | www.capgemini.com

title: Experienced data solution professional – in Stockholm or Gothenburg
description:
Do you want to be a part of shaping Valcon as a premium technology consulting firm in Sweden? Do you have 8 years of experience in consulting and/or other relevant roles? And are you passionate about creating lasting results for clients? Then you could be our new colleague.
   

  

 Valcon is a leading European management consulting firm with Scandinavian roots and an informal, inclusive culture. With offices in the Netherlands, Denmark, the UK, Sweden, Germany, Croatia and Serbia, we strive to connect strategy with operations through innovative technology and data. We are looking for an experienced and curious individual who values collaboration and thrives in dynamic, diverse environments.
   

  

**Experience**
* 8 years of experience in data consulting or other relevant roles
* Hands-on expertise
* Data Bricks, Microsoft Fabric
* A relevant Master degree


**Keywords**
* Creating lasting results
* Commercial mindset


**Location** 
 : Sweden
   

  

**What You Will Do**
 As a experienced data solution professional at Valcon, you will:
   

  

* Be part of the digital advisory team in one of the fastest-growing consultancies in Europe
* Contribute to our exciting growth journey while contributing to our expanding presence in the Swedish market
* Work side by side with skilled and experienced colleagues in diverse and international teams, tackling challenges from digital strategies to IT implementations
* Solve complex problems for Swedish and international companies across industries, guiding them to unlock the full potential of their data
* Help clients become more data-driven, comply with laws and regulations regarding their data and help them get the most value out of their data


**What We Are Looking For**
 To thrive in this role, you should be able to say yes to some or all of the following:
   

  

* 8 years of experience in data consulting or other relevant roles
* A relevant Master’s degree
* A strong understanding of industry standards, best practices and emerging trends in data, such as data governance, engineering, AI, and machine learning
* Hands-on expertise in designing scalable, secure and high-performing data/technical solutions aligned with client needs
* Proficiency in leading-edge tools and platforms such as Databricks, Celonis, Microsoft Fabric and the broader Azure ecosystem specialising in data and AI solutions
* Experience in data architecture, including data modelling and warehousing
* A commercial mindset with a proven track record in uncovering growth opportunities, building strong client relationships and selling complex technical assignments
* A thoughtful approach to leadership with the ability to guide and mentor project teams effectively
* Relevant certifications in IT management, project management (e.g., PMP) and digital transformation (e.g., CDT). ITIL, Microsoft and Cloud are a plus
* Excellent communication and presentation skills in both Swedish and English with the ability to translate technical concepts for a variety of stakeholders


**We offer you**
 At Valcon, we believe in fostering a diverse and inclusive environment where everyone feels valued and respected. We offer:
   

  

* A diverse and international workplace with an informal culture and a flat hierarchy
* The opportunity to collaborate across business areas and levels and work closely with some of the most talented and experienced consultants in the industry
* A focus on professional and personal growth, supported by our value-driven culture, which is grounded in Integrity, Together, Joy, Curious, and Can Do
* Enhanced benefits and support throughout all life stages, including maternity, paternity and adoption leave, health and well-being initiatives and resources for navigating significant life transitions
* A welcoming office environment in either Stockholm (Kungsgatan 9) or Gothenburg (Kungsportsavenyen 21)


 We care deeply about results, but we care even more about people. At Valcon, you’ll find a workplace that values excellence and ingenuity while keeping grounded in the reality of delivering lasting results for our clients.
   

  

**Application**
 Does this sound like the right opportunity for you? If so, we encourage you to apply below. For any questions or additional information, feel free to reach out to [email protected].
   

  

 We are reviewing applications and conducting interviews on an ongoing basis, so please send us your application as soon as possible.

title: Senior Solution Architect
description:
**Senior Solution Architect Apply online** 




  





**Change your job, change your workplace, change your future...** 




  





 Are you a highly motivated and experienced Solution Architect looking to make a significant impact in the Audio Visual (AV) and Video Conferencing (VC) space? Join our dynamic team at Ricoh Sweden, where you'll play a key role in designing innovative AV/VC solutions for corporate, public, and retail sectors.
 



  





**What you will be doing** 




 As a Solution Architect, you will work closely with our sales team to deliver exceptional AV/VC solutions tailored to client needs. Your responsibilities will include:
 


* Designing cutting-edge AV/VC systems and technical proposals based on client specifications and project briefs.
* Collaborating with key customer stakeholders, including IT and Facilities teams, to gather technical requirements and ensure seamless integration.
* Creating well-structured and comprehensive Bill of Materials (BoM) for pricing and project execution.
* Estimating engineering, commissioning, installation, and labor costs for proposed solutions.
* Providing expert technical support to the sales and onsite technical teams.
* Participating in design workshops and client consultations to align expectations and refine project scope.
* Developing detailed system schematics, rack layouts, cabling plans, room layouts, and coordination diagrams using AutoCAD, Xten - AV, and MS Visio.
* Facilitating smooth handovers from pre-sales/sales to operations teams.
* Staying current with emerging AV/VC technologies through manufacturer training courses and certifications.
* Assisting the bid team in crafting cost-effective solutions for public tenders.



  





**We’re seeking a driven individual with the following qualifications:** 



* Proven experience in a similar role with an AV/VC integrator or consultancy.
* Extensive knowledge of AV/VC systems, including unified communications, audio, video, control, signal routing, and AV/VC over IP.
* Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite, particularly O365 and networking fundamentals.
* Strong understanding of Teams Admin Center and Pro Management Portal.
* Advanced skills in AutoCAD, Xten - AV, and MS Visio.
* Exceptional communication skills in both Swedish and English.
* Demonstrated ability to foster strong relationships with internal and external stakeholders.



  





**You'll ideally have:** 



* Microsoft Teams Rooms certification, AVIXA: CTS, Dante, Crestron DMC-4K Digital Media, Crestron CTI-P101, QSYS, Architect, QSYS Level 1, Dante - Level 1,2,3, Shure - Level 1,2, Yealink Pro Audio Designer, Shure IntelliMix Room, Bose – ControlSpace,



  





**Designer Technical tracks:** 



* Q-SYS, Neat, Yealink, Shure, Biamp, Logitech, LG, Samsung, HP/Poly: Cisco, Crestron, LED solutions, Microsoft etc



  





**Personal Attributes:** 



* Self-motivated with exceptional time management and prioritization skills.
* Hands-on, proactive, and solution-focused approach.
* Ability to inspire trust and establish credibility as a trusted advisor.
* Creative thinker with a knack for innovative, solutions-based design.

title: Cybersäkerhetsspecialist  / Penetration tester
description:
**Techster Solutions** 
 befinner i dagsläget sig i en spännande tillväxtfas och söker nu fler kollegor, inledningsvis dig med minst
 **3+** 
 års erfarenhet och som kan stärka teamet.
   

  

 Du kan förvänta dig en omväxlande miljö, dagarna kan se väldigt olika ut - men en sak är säkert, här får du använda dina kompetenser och sätter själv gränsen för hur mycket du vill utvecklas. Som ett kunskapsbolag är det viktigt för oss att våra specialister delar med sig av sin kompetens och får kollegorna att växa.
   

  

 Generellt
   

  

 Är du en erfaren och driven cybersäkerhetsspecialist med fokus på penetrationstester och åtgärder i både onprem och molnmiljöer? Vill du arbeta med säkerhetstester, identifiera sårbarheter och leda kunder genom åtgärdsrekommendationer och implementeringar? Då kan detta vara rollen för dig!
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Vi söker en
 **Cybersäkerhetsspecialist** 
**/ Penetration Tester** 
 som kan ta ett helhetsgrepp om säkerhetstester – från identifiering av sårbarheter till åtgärdsförslag och genomförande. Du kommer att arbeta med
 **automatiserade plattformar** 
 för penetrationstester inom infrastruktur, webbapplikationer och andra kritiska IT-miljöer.
   

  

 I din roll kommer du att:
   

  

* Genomföra penetrationstester och säkerhetsgranskningar på både webbapplikationer och infrastruktur onprem såväl som Cloud
* Analysera resultat från tester och identifiera sårbarheter och rådgöra med kund.
* Ta fram åtgärdsförslag och genomföra säkerhetsförbättringar hos kunder.
* Rådgiva kunder i säkerhetsstrategier och best practices.


**Kvalifikationer**
 Vi tror att du har:
   

  

* Erfarenhet av penetrationstester inom infrastruktur, webbapplikationer och molntjänster.
* Bred kunskap och förståelse för företagsmiljöer och molnplattformar som Azure, AWS eller Google Cloud.
* Förståelse för sårbarhetsanalys, hotmodellering och attacker i verkliga scenarier samt duktig på att uttrycka sig och förklara detta för motparter.
* Förmåga att ta kunder från testning till implementerade säkerhetsåtgärder.
* Erfarenhet av automatiserade testverktyg och manuella tester.
* Kunskap om relevanta säkerhetsstandarder och ramverk (exempelvis OWASP, NIST, MITRE ATT&CK).


**Meriterande**
* Certifieringar såsom OSCP, OSWE, CISSP, CEH eller liknande.
* Erfarenhet av DevSecOps och säker kodgranskning.
* Förmåga att utveckla skript och verktyg för säkerhetstester.


**Ansökan**
 Tror du att du är
 **Techster Solutions** 
 nästa stjärna? Tveka då inte att skicka in din ansökan redan nu. Urval sker löpande och tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.
   

  

**Arbetsplats och kultur**
 Vi är ett entreprenörsdrivet IT företag, med både produktkunskap och försäljning (Techster AB) och konsultativa tjänster (Techster Solutions AB). Det innebär att vi är mycket öppna för nya tekniska lösningar, kunskapsutbyte och ständigt lärande. Att ha roligt och samtidigt behålla den familjära andan utan hierarkier är lika viktigt.
   

  

 Vi vill skapa det konsultbolag som du alltid velat jobba för, men kanske inte hittat ännu. Redan idag har vi en blandning av seniora och yngre medarbetare, såväl som män och kvinnor. Det vill vi fortsätta att bygga på. Så välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Machine Learning Engineer – Energy Optimisation
description:
10% of Europe’s CO₂ emissions are caused by residential heating, and energy bills are out of control. Aira is here to change that.
   

  

 With our intelligent Aira Heat Pump at the heart, we’re making the switch to clean energy-tech easier and more affordable. Helping Europe turn off gas and slashing energy costs one home at a time.
   

  

 Founded in 2022, and with 1000+ employees and counting, Aira is driving the clean energy revolution by providing homes with modern clean energy-tech solutions such as solar power, battery storage solutions, and heat pumps. With a state-of-the-art production facility in Poland, an HQ in Stockholm, Sweden, and hubs across the UK, Germany, and Italy, Aira is well on track to install clean energy-tech into 5 million homes by 2034.
   

  

**About The Role**
 Join our growing Energy Optimisation team as a Machine Learning Engineer (full-time, in-house) and help build and maintain the models that make up Aira’s intelligent home energy management system. By connecting our customers’ Aira devices - solar, batteries, heat pumps, and EV chargers - our system personalises energy management, adapts to customer preferences, usage patterns, and external factors like weather forecasts and energy tariffs, all with the mission to reduce energy bills and cut CO₂ emissions.
   

  

 This role combines technical work with a product mindset. You'll dive into the details of machine learning models and energy optimisation, while also shaping the customer experience: how do we balance cost and comfort, how do we build trust in our intelligence, and how do we make our models understandable and explainable to our customers?
   

  

 You’ll be joining a fast-moving, small team with high ownership. We’re looking for an ML Engineer comfortable working across the full data stack, who brings a product mindset, strong collaboration skills, and a drive to turn complex models into everyday value for our customers.
   

  

**What You’ll Be Doing**
* Apply your mathematical and ML knowledge to solve real-world energy problems.
* Develop optimisation models balancing dynamic tariffs, weather forecasts, customer behaviour, and preferences to achieve the perfect balance between cost savings and comfort for each individual customer and home.
* Design, build, productionise, and iterate on Aira’s energy optimisation models
* Collaborate with product designers, software, and hardware engineers to co-create features that will make our customers love their Aira products and save more money on their energy bills.
* Test new approaches quickly, learn from results, and scale up the ones that make a difference


**What You’ll Bring To The Role**
* You’re energized by fast-moving, product-driven environments where progress matters and the customer perspective guides our decisions.
* You’re motivated by impact - what matters is not the perfect model, but the value it gives to the customer.
* You have a background in machine learning, enjoy applying theory to develop real-world applications, with experience in reinforcement learning, general neural networks, and/or other methods relevant to personalisation and optimisation problems.
* You have strong coding skills and have built ML systems in production, ideally using Python, Java, or similar. Familiarity with tools like TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Scikit-learn is beneficial but not required.
* You’re comfortable working with large-scale data pipelines, orchestration tools (e.g., Airflow), stream processing (e.g., Kafka), and cloud platforms (e.g., GCP or AWS).
* You're ready to take initiative and accountability, and you're able to lead or contribute to high-stakes technical discussions.
* You're open to working primarily from our Stockholm office


**What is in it for you?**
* Gain hands-on experience in a fast-growing scale-up, with a supportive and inclusive culture, and career advancement opportunities.
* Collaborate with diverse teams across international markets and launch products globally.
* Develop and grow personally and professionally in an entrepreneurial-minded environment.
* Thrive in a dynamic, solution-oriented culture, tackling challenges and driving meaningful solutions that make a positive impact on the world.
* Influence the company's success, with a visible impact on product development and market growth.
* Enjoy our brand-new office at Norra Stationsgatan 93 in Stockholm. Conveniently located near public transport, with Sankt Eriksplan and Odenplan stations just a few minutes walk away.


 At Aira, we champion next-generation energy as well as diversity and inclusion. We firmly believe that a diverse workforce fosters innovation and creativity, enhancing our ability to serve customers and communities effectively. We welcome individuals from all backgrounds, cultures, and perspectives to join our team. Our commitment is to uphold equality and inclusivity, fostering a collaborative environment where everyone can thrive and contribute to a better future for our people and the planet.

title: Application Security Engineer
description:
**Join our global force of 500+ innovators, blending the latest in tech with the greatest in soundtracking, from our Stockholm HQ to offices in London, New York, Los Angeles, Berlin, Oslo, and Seoul. We’re an industry leader with a startup mentality. We take what we do seriously, but we don’t take ourselves too seriously. Creating and collaborating to transform the sound of streaming, content, and culture. Come join us— and let the world feel your work.**
 We are looking for a
 **Security Engineer,** 
 specializing in
 **Application** 
 or
 **Product Security** 
 , you will form a key part of the Security Division here at Epidemic Sound. You, along with your team, will help ensure our customers and services are protected from a wide range of online threats. Although we are a global company, this position will be based in our Stockholm office.
   

  

**The role**
 Help to design and increase the maturity of our Secure Software Development Lifecycle (SSDLC) to remain resilient to ever changing attack vectors. Balance working closely with a small team of security experts with embedding regularly with product development teams to understand our product needs, build relationships, and translate security knowledge and best practices to best suit the needs of our product teams through in person interactions as well as code libraries and written documentation.
   

  

**Your key responsibilities include:**
* Working closely with software engineering teams and individuals to identify, track and fix vulnerabilities/risks in our applications and products.
* Expanding, architecting, implementing and evangelizing our SSDLC.
* Sharing your knowledge through solid documentation, secure coding libraries, secure code reviews, delivering internal tech talks and security awareness training to technical staff.
* Embedding within development teams to build secure awareness and accurately gauge risk profiles throughout our product environment.
* Promoting secure ways of working across all areas of the organization.
* Helping to identify and evaluate new security tools and services, and integrate existing tools and services into central dashboarding tools.
* Assisting with security incidents (including on-call), breaches and training exercises around them, including creating security patches.
* Working on a wide range of projects and new initiatives in the team.
* Responding to product security-related requests from across the organization.
* Mentoring junior security engineers.
* Writing solid documentation that can be used by a wide range of different viewers.


**Requirements:**
* Experience securing products and applications, familiarity with BurpSuite Enterprise, Snyk and Burpsuite Professional especially appreciated.
* Security features of the big public cloud providers (preferably GCP)
* At least one programming or scripting language (Python, Go, Kotlin, Node.js, and Bash experience preferred)
* Kubernetes, Docker or any other containerization architecture
* Experience with Git, Github Actions and Terraform
* Identifying vulnerabilities in software, systems and processes
* Static code analysis
* Writing test cases for existing code
* Penetration Testing


 And a good understanding or working knowledge of common security frameworks (ISO 27001, SOC2, PCI-DSS, NIST, etc), compliance and regulatory requirements.
   

  

**Equal opportunity employer**
 We believe that bringing people together from different backgrounds, experiences and perspectives makes for a healthy workplace, a more successful business and a better world. We value diversity and encourage everyone to come and soundtrack the world with us.
   

  

**Application**
 Ready to make the world feel your work? Apply now by clicking the link below! We embrace a hybrid model but love collaborating in person, so we spend the majority of our time in the office.
   

  

**Join our global force of 500+ innovators, blending the latest in tech with the greatest in soundtracking, from our Stockholm HQ to offices in London, New York, Los Angeles, Berlin, Oslo, and Seoul. We’re an industry leader with a startup mentality. We take what we do seriously, but we don’t take ourselves too seriously. Creating and collaborating to transform the sound of streaming, content, and culture. Come join us—and let the world feel your work.**

title: Infrastructure Specialist
description:
*Vill du arbeta i en självständig roll* 
*där du kan påverka och göra skillnad i Sveriges största fackförbund på den privata arbetsmarknaden och landets största tjänstemannaförbund? Unionen har en prestigelös och välkomnande kultur samt ett dynamiskt arbetssätt och är mitt inne i en spännande digitaliseringsresa. Vill du vara en nyckelperson som är med och leder oss in i framtidens moderna arbetsplats?* 




  





**Om tjänsten** 




 Den här tjänsten är en direktrekrytering vilket innebär att rekryteringsprocessen sker genom Bravura och du anställs direkt hos Unionen.
 



  





**Om företaget** 




 Unionen är Sveriges största fackförbund och finns för tjänstemän på den privata arbetsmarknaden. Deras vision är att skapa trygghet, framgång och glädje i arbetslivet. Unionen har inflytande och ansvar för mer än bara dem själva, och en ambition att driva frågor som påverkar hela samhället. De bidrar med att varje dag hjälpa människor i det privata arbetslivet att få det bättre på arbetsmarknaden.
 



  





 Unionen har kontor i 18 regioner i hela Sverige med cirka 1000 medarbetare. I Stockholm sitter du tillsammans med 600 kollegor i moderna lokaler med eget gym mitt i Stockholm City. Kontoret präglas av en prestigelös och välkomnande kultur samt värderar gemenskap och trygghet högt.
 



  





**Arbetsuppgifter** 




 Som infrastruktur- och molnspecialist säkerställer du att Unionens driftmiljö oavsett var den befinner sig är stabil, dokumenterad och säker. Du har tillsammans med Service Delivery Managern ett övergripande ansvar för att styra och förvalta Unionens nät, kapacitetstjänster och molnmiljöer. Unionen har mycket Microsoft-produkter i sitt IT-landskap. Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter är:
 



  




* Att både säkra ett effektivt och tydligt samarbete med kravställare och mottagare av tjänsterna samt möjliggöra ett ansvar för att paketera och styra leveransen av tjänsterna ur ett system- och leverantörsperspektiv.
* Vara delaktig i arbete med vision och strategi för drift & infrastruktur i Microsofts publika moln och Unionens datacenter.
* Arbeta med governance-strukturer med rätt forum, deltagare och aktiviteter.
* Stötta arkitekter och projektledare genom att bistå i förutsättningsskapande för förflyttningen till molnbaserade miljöer.
* Arbeta nära övriga inom IT-enheten och vara deras bollplank avseende daglig drift och förändringsarbete.
* Bistå i arbetet kring budget, avtal och kostnadsuppföljning.



  





**Utbildning, erfarenhet och personliga egenskaper** 



* Erfarenhet av leverantörsstyrning, avtalshantering och uppföljning
* Erfarenhet av förvaltning av datacenter, nätverk och infrastruktur, inklusive LAN/WAN
* Erfarenhet av att etablera och underhålla driftleveranser i hybridmiljöer
* Erfarenhet av arbete med Azure PaaS och IaaS tjänster
* Obehindrad svenska och engelska i tal och skrift



  





 Som person tror vi att du har förståelse för hur förändring påverkar organisationer och individer och gärna har erfarenhet av förändringsledning. Du har lätt för att arbeta självständigt och fatta beslut samtidigt som du trivs att samverka i olika team i gränssnittet mellan IT och leverantörer. Du är prestigelös, kommunikativ och har lätt att samarbeta med andra. För dig är det självklart att skapa struktur samt prioritera för att uppnå både kort- och långsiktiga mål. Du har en förmåga att skapa delaktighet och engagemang och drivs av viljan att förstå verksamhetens behov för att kunna leverera kvalitet. Vi tror också att du har god förståelse för drivkrafter i idédrivna organisationer.
 



  





**Övrig information** 




**Start:** 
 Enligt överenskommelse
 



**Plats:** 
 Olof Palmes Gata 17, Hötorget, Stockholm. Kontoret är huvudsaklig arbetsplats, med möjlighet att utföra arbete på annan plats en del av tiden (just nu ca två dagar i veckan).
 



**Lön:** 
 Fast lön enligt överenskommelse, övriga villkor enligt kollektivavtal
 



**Facklig kontakt:** 
 Tobias Levin,
 
 tobias.levin@unionen.se
 
 , 08-50415537
 



  





 Vi gör ett löpande urval, så skicka in din ansökan redan idag! Vid frågor eller funderingar, kontakta ansvarig rekryterare Julia Paulin via
 
 julia.paulin@bravura.se
 
 eller 072-143 91 82.

title: Clinical Solutions Executive
description:
At Cepheid, we are passionate about improving health care through fast, accurate diagnostic testing. Our mission drives us, every moment of every day, as we develop scalable, groundbreaking solutions to solve the world’s most complex health challenges. Our associates are involved in every stage of molecular diagnostics, from ideation to development and delivery of testing advancements that improve patient outcomes across a range of settings. As a member of our team, you can make an immediate, measurable impact on a global scale, within an environment that fosters career growth and development.
   

  

 Cepheid is proud to work alongside a community of six fellow Danaher Diagnostics companies. Together, we’re working at the pace of change on diagnostic tools that address the world’s biggest health challenges, driven by knowing that behind every test there is a patient waiting.
   

  

 Learn about the Danaher Business System which makes everything possible.
   

  

 The Clinical Solutions Executive will support Cepheid Nordics in achieving commercial goals and help Cepheid customers to fully understand and utilize the clinical benefits/impact of Cepheid technology and products. The role involves working closely with the sales team to develop pre- and post-sales strategies, support newly launched products, and boost assay utilization.
   

  

 This position is part of the Commercial Sales Department and is a remote position based in either Sweden or Finland. At Cepheid, our vision is to be the leading provider of seamlessly connected diagnostic solutions.
   

  

**In this role, you will have the opportunity to:**
* Support sales strategies and execution to achieve commercial goals in the Nordics.
* Educate and train clinical stakeholders on the impact and use of Cepheid products.
* Develop strong relationships with clinicians and key opinion leaders to drive advocacy.
* Create and support business opportunities through clinical engagement and product demonstrations.
* Collaborate with Medical and Scientific Affairs on clinical case studies and product positioning.
* Stay current with clinical data and healthcare guidelines to inform strategy and communication.
* Partner with internal teams including Sales, Marketing, and Field Application Specialists to optimize customer experience.


**The essential requirements of the job include:**
* MSc or PhD degree Physician, Clinical Pharmacist, Clinical Laboratory Sciences subspecialty (Microbiology, Molecular biology), or Infectious Diseases OR Nursing degree in field
* Minimum of 8 years experience in Swedish or Finnish healthcare market
* Basic knowledge in Microbiology, Molecular biology & Infectious Diseases
* Clinical experience including evidence of implementing change in hospital/healthcare environments.
* Excellent Selling and negotiation skills.
* Fluent in English and Swedish or Finnish


**Travel, Motor Vehicle Record & Physical/Environment Requirements:**
* Ability to travel up to 30% within the Nordic region.
* Must have a valid driver’s license with an acceptable driving record.


 Cepheid, a Danaher operating company, offers a broad array of comprehensive, competitive benefit programs that add value to our lives. Whether it’s a health care program or paid time off, our programs contribute to life beyond the job. Check out our benefits at danaherbenefitsinfo.com.
   

  

 At Cepheid we believe in designing a better, more sustainable workforce. We recognize the benefits of flexible, remote working arrangements for eligible roles and are committed to providing enriching careers, no matter the work arrangement. This position is eligible for a remote work arrangement in which you can work remotely from your home. Additional information about this remote work arrangement will be provided by your interview team. Explore the flexibility and challenge that working for Cepheid can provide.
   

  

 Join our winning team today. Together, we’ll accelerate the real-life impact of tomorrow’s science and technology. We partner with customers across the globe to help them solve their most complex challenges, architecting solutions that bring the power of science to life.
   

  

 For more information, visit www.danaher.com.
   

  

 At Danaher, we value diversity and the existence of similarities and differences, both visible and not, found in our workforce, workplace and throughout the markets we serve. Our associates, customers and shareholders contribute unique and different perspectives as a result of these diverse attributes.

title: Enterprise IAM Architect
description:
**About Us**
 We are the independent expert in assurance and risk management. Driven by our purpose, to safeguard life, property, and the environment, we empower our customers and their stakeholders with facts and reliable insights so that critical decisions can be made with confidence.
   

  

 As a trusted voice for many of the world’s most successful organizations, we use our knowledge to advance safety and performance, set industry benchmarks, and inspire and invent solutions to tackle global transformations.
   

  

**About The Accelerator**
 We rapidly nurture successful businesses and services that will shape the future of assurance. The Accelerator operates a portfolio of units undergoing significant growth, chiefly through acquisitions and partnerships. The Accelerator acts as a greenhouse for a strategically selected portfolio of businesses, each of which serves different industries and markets. The portfolio benefits from dedicated support to rapidly grow through organic means, as well as through acquisitions and partnerships. Three business units were housed in the Accelerator in 2022: Cyber Security, Digital Health, and Inspection.
   

  

**About The Role**
 Our Identity and Access Management team is committed to helping our clients navigate the complex landscape of digital identity and access management. As a leading provider of strategic advisory and business consultancy services, we specialize in delivering innovative and secure solutions that drive business success. We are currently looking for a highly skilled
 **Enterprise IAM Architect** 
 to join our team in
 **Stockholm, Oslo, Hellerup or Amsterdam** 
 .
   

  

**The Enterprise IAM Architect** 
 will play a pivotal role in advising and guiding our clients on their Identity and Access Management (IAM) strategies. This role requires a deep understanding of IAM, with good understanding of Identity Governance and Administration (IGA), Privileged Access Management (PAM), and Customer Identity and Access Management (CIAM) solutions. The ideal candidate will not only have technical expertise but also the ability to provide strategic advisory services, helping clients align their IAM initiatives with their overall business objectives.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Serve as a strategic advisor to clients, helping them define and implement IAM strategies that align with their business goals, with a focus on IGA, PAM, and CIAM.
* Lead the design, architecture, and deployment of comprehensive IAM solutions across complex, multi-national environments.
* Collaborate with client stakeholders to understand their business needs and translate them into effective IAM strategies and roadmaps.
* Provide expert guidance on the selection and integration of IAM technologies, ensuring they meet both current and future business requirements.
* Conduct assessments of existing IAM infrastructures, identifying gaps, and recommending improvements.
* Lead workshops, training sessions, and presentations to educate clients on best practices in IGA, PAM, and CIAM.
* Stay current with the latest trends and developments in IAM, advising clients on how to leverage emerging technologies and methodologies.
* Work closely with internal teams and client stakeholders to ensure successful project delivery, from initial consultation through to post-implementation support.


**Location: Preferred location is Stockholm, Sweden but other European locations will be considered for the right candidate.**
 What we offer
   

  

 We offer a place where you can find meaningful work, have fun, be inspired, and respected. With us you will have the opportunity to gain experience from multiple areas of cybersecurity and business. We believe in a culture of empowerment, and we value professionalism in all of its dimensions. Our organization model supports sharing knowledge, working and learning without unit barriers. We offer you the opportunity to work in a leading cyber security company where you find opportunities for professional development and means to balance professional challenges with your personal life. DNV is an Equal Opportunity Employer and gives consideration for employment to qualified applicants without regard to gender, religion, race, national or ethnic origin, cultural background, social group, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, age or political opinion. Diversity is fundamental to our culture and we invite you to be part of this diversity.
   

  

**About You**
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field; Master’s degree preferred.
* 7+ years of experience in IAM, with basic understanding of and specific expertise in at least one of the following areas: IGA, PAM, and CIAM.
* Proven experience in a strategic advisory or business consultancy role, with the ability to influence and guide senior stakeholders.
* Familiar with IAM technologies such as LDAP, SSO, MFA, RBAC, OAuth, SAML, and directory services.
* Experience with IAM platforms such as Okta, Ping Identity, Microsoft Azure AD, or similar.
* Strong knowledge of security frameworks and regulations such as NIST, ISO 27001, and GDPR.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills, with fluency in English and native proficiency in Norwegian, Swedish, Finnish, Danish, Dutch (specific to location).
* Ability to travel as needed across the Nordic region and the Benelux.


 Need more information?
   

  

 If you have any questions regarding this position, please reach out to the hiring manager pascal.van.vugt@dnv.com

title: Supporttekniker inom telefoni
description:
**Är du intresserad av att arbeta med teknik och service samtidigt som du utvecklas i en spännande organisation? Vi söker personer som har stort kundfokus och tycker om att ge professionell service. Har du erfarenhet av support, då kan jobbet hos oss på serviceförvaltningen vara rätt för dig!**
 Om oss
   

  

 Avdelningen service och support på serviceförvaltningen bidrar med specialistkompetens inom första och andra nivå support. Vi tar emot och hanterar inkommande supportsamtal och ärenden från kärnverksamheterna om bland annat incidenter och serviceförfrågningar som kontobehörigheter, e-tjänstekort och applikation- och tekniksupport. Vårt gemensamma uppdrag är att lösa ärendet vid den första kontakten. Om det är ett mer komplext ärende som inte kan lösas direkt eskaleras det vidare till andra grupperingar. Andra nivåns support har även specialkompetens och sköter administrativt arbete inom vissa områden.
   

  

 Om tjänsten
   

  

 Du kommer att ingå i ett team som ger support till regionens användare gällande frågor som rör telefoni. Som medarbetare supporterar vi kundens användare via telefon, ärenden och remote. Vi hanterar första nivå ärenden inom området telefoni, tex Samsung och Iphone mjukvara, TeleQ och övriga användarfrågor.
   

  

 Rollen ställer höga krav på service och kundbemötande. Du hanterar verksamhetskritiska och patientkritiska incidenter tillsammans med operativa incidentmanagers och kontrollerar och följer upp tilldelade ärenden. Vårt viktigaste uppdrag är att ge stöd och service som vänder sig direkt mot slutanvändare, där kundnärhet är den gemensamma nämnaren.
   

  

 Exempel på arbetsuppgifter:
   

  

* Ta emot och registrera inkommande telefonsamtal i vårt ärendehanteringssystem
* Registrera ärenden enligt fastställd ärenderegistreringsrutin
* Säkerställa att ärenden är välskrivna och innehåller adekvat information för att, om nödvändigt, kunna eskaleras vidare till andra tilldelningsgrupper inom serviceförvaltningen
* Se till att vi i vår kontakt med verksamheten använder ett så enkelt språk som möjligt, så att användaren förstår oss i vår kommunikation
* Arbeta aktivt i våra teams/kanaler/chattar i Teams
* Arbeta processorienterat och följa de fastställda ITIL-processerna


 Vem är du?
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har tidigare erfarenhet av att arbeta med Samsung och Iphone-mjukvara. Du har tidigare erfarenhet från servicedesk eller helpdesk, där du hanterat användarfrågor och teknisk support. Du besitter god förmåga att felsöka och ge användarstöd på ett professionellt och serviceinriktat sätt. Du är lättlärd, flexibel och kan snabbt sätta dig in i nya system och tekniker. Som person är du ansvarstagande, självgående och anpassningsbar och har lätt för att samarbeta med andra. Du är kommunikativ och behärskar svenska språket väl i tal och skrift, då kommunikation med våra användare utgör en stor del av jobbet. Du lägger stort fokus på kvalité och service anpassat till våra användarens IT förmåga.
   

  

 För att passa för rollen har du dessutom:
   

  

* Gymnasieutbildning
* Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet från servicedesk/helpdesk/IT support
* ITIL certifiering


 Vi ser det som en fördel om du har erfarenhet av ärendehanteringssystemet ServiceNow eller motsvarande system.
   

  

 Självklart har du ett intresse för vår verksamhet och innehållet i tjänsten.
   

  

 Vårt erbjudande
   

  

 Vi erbjuder en dynamisk och varierande arbetsmiljö med möjlighet att arbeta med olika kunduppdrag och du är del i ett stöttande team och en kultur där vi värdesätter samarbete och service. Inom enheten arbetar vi aktivt med intern utveckling och utbildningar inom service och support.
   

  

 Vi har kollektivavtal och med det följer kollektivavtalade försäkringar, tjänstepension och möjlighet till löneväxling. För att du ska kunna ta ansvar för din hälsa erbjuder vi friskvårdstimme och friskvårdsbidrag samt subventionerad sjukvård i form av kostnadsfri öppensjukvård. Flexibel arbetstid och möjlighet till att arbeta hemifrån har vi för att underlätta för dig att få ihop vardagen. Här kan du läsa mer om förmånerna i vårt kollektivavtal.
   

  

 Vi sitter i fina lokaler på Lindhagensgatan 98. Hit tar du dig enkelt med kollektivtrafiken.
   

  

 Ansökan
   

  

 Låter det här som något för dig ser vi gärna att du söker så snart som möjligt. För en komplett ansökan räcker det med att bifoga ditt CV. När du ansöker kommer du att få besvara ett antal frågor, dessa ersätter personligt brev.
   

  

 Har du frågor om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta:
   

  

* Christine Hallberg, enhetschef för support 1: christine.hallberg@regionstockholm.se
* David Echeverria, enhetschef för support 2: david.echeverria-oyarzun@regionstockholm.se


**Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!**
 Övrigt
   

  

 Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid. En inledande provanställning på sex månader kan komma att tillämpas.
   

  

 Det här är en arbetsplats för dig som gillar att ge service och vill att din insats ska göra skillnad. Vi på serviceförvaltningen ska underlätta vardagen för våra kollegor i Region Stockholms kärnverksamheter så att de kan fokusera på patienter, resenärer, invånare och besökare. Vi är 700 personer som arbetar med inköp och upphandling, löne- och personaladministration, ekonomi- och redovisningsadministration, it och medicinsk teknik, användarstöd, lokalservice med mera. Varmt välkommen till en arbetsplats där du blir en del av något större! Läs mer här
   

  

 Att söka jobb i Region Stockholm Vi eftersträvar jämställdhet och jämlikhet på vår arbetsplats och ser gärna sökande med olika bakgrund och förutsättningar. Vi tar endast emot ansökningar via detta system. Ansök genom att klicka på knappen ”Ansök”. Ansökningar per brev eller e-post beaktas inte. Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt säljare av ytterligare jobbannonser. Vårt rekryteringssystem kan inte hantera anonyma ansökningar eller sökande med skyddade personuppgifter. Om du har skyddade personuppgifter ber vi dig att kontakta den kontaktpersonen som finns angiven i annonsen. Din ansökan kommer då att hanteras utanför rekryteringssystemet. Du bör även vara försiktig med vilken information du lämnar i din ansökan och endast ta med information som är relevant för den aktuella befattningen. Region Stockholm ansvarar för hälso- och sjukvård, kollektivtrafik, regional utveckling och bidrar till kulturlivet. Varje dag, dygnet runt. I landets snabbaste växande region. Tillsammans skapar vi Europas attraktivaste storstadsregion. Läs mer om hur det är att jobba hos oss i Region Stockholm
   

  

 Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100% | Ort: Stockholm | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2025/4190 | Kontakt: Christine Hallberg christine.hallberg@regionstockholm.se, David Echeverria david.echeverria-oyarzun@regionstockholm.se, | Facklig företrädare: Claes Kilgren, SACO 08-12317944, Anne-Lie Vestlund, Vision 08-12314280, | Publicerat: 2025-06-23 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-07-31

title: EMEA Generative AI & Innovative Technologies Partner
description:
At Johnson & Johnson, we believe health is everything. Our strength in healthcare innovation empowers us to build a world where complex diseases are prevented, treated, and cured, where treatments are smarter and less invasive, and solutions are personal. Through our expertise in Innovative Medicine and MedTech, we are uniquely positioned to innovate across the full spectrum of healthcare solutions today to deliver the breakthroughs of tomorrow, and profoundly impact health for humanity. Learn more at https://www.jnj.com
   

  

**Job Function**
 Data Analytics & Computational Sciences
   

  

**Job Sub Function**
 Data Science Portfolio Management
   

  

**Job Category**
 Professional
   

  

**All Job Posting Locations:**
 AT005 Vorgartenstrasse, Beerse, Antwerp, Belgium, Breda, Netherlands, Budapest, Hungary, Espoo, Uusimaa, Finland, High Wycombe, Buckinghamshire, United Kingdom, Madrid, Spain, Milano, Italy, Neuss, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany, Novi Beograd, Beograd, Serbia, Oslo, Norway, Paris, Île-de-France, France, PL002 Iłżecka, Porto Salvo, Portugal, Stockholm, Stockholm, Sweden, Zug, Switzerland
   

  

**Job Description**
 At Johnson & Johnson Innovative Medicine, we are seeking an
 **EMEA Generative AI and Innovative Technologies Partner** 
 .
   

  

 This position is located within the regional Customer & Digital Strategy (CDS) department and plays a key role in shaping how we use generative AI and emerging technologies to drive business transformation.
   

  

 We are looking for someone who can connect technology with business impact, translate complex concepts into strategic value, and engage a variety of stakeholders across functions.
   

  

 In this role, you will be responsible for defining the long-term vision, strategy, and execution roadmap for applying generative AI and other emerging technologies to transform business challenges into opportunities across our portfolio of products and services.
   

  

 We are looking for a strategic leader with deep expertise in AI, exceptional stakeholder management skills, and the ability to drive AI adoption at scale. You will be expected to demonstrate strong understanding of the business context and the customer needs, and to align the technology solutions with the strategic objectives and priorities of the organization. You will work closely with senior business stakeholders, IT partners, and external vendors to deliver innovative solutions that meet the needs of our customers and markets.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Define the long-term vision, strategy, and execution roadmap for applying generative AI and other innovative technologies to create value and impact for our patients and employees across our portfolio of products and services.
* Will work closely with senior business stakeholders, IT partners, and external vendors to deliver innovative solutions that meet the needs of our customers and markets.
* Manage the end-to-end lifecycle of the generative AI and technology innovation projects, from ideation and scoping, to development and testing, to deployment and scaling, to evaluation and optimization.
* Ensure the quality, reliability, and security of the generative AI and technology solutions, and comply with the relevant standards, policies, and regulations.
* Measure and communicate the value and impact of the generative AI and technology solutions, using quantitative and qualitative metrics and indicators, and report on the progress and outcomes of the projects to senior management and other stakeholders.
* Keep abreast of the latest trends and developments in generative AI and other emerging technologies, and identify and evaluate new opportunities and challenges for applying them to our business domains and use cases.


**Required Knowledge, Skills And Abilities**
* A minimum of a Masters degree in computer science, engineering, or a related field, with a focus on AI, machine learning, or data science.
* Minimum 5 years of experience in data science, AI or technology innovation projects or teams, preferably in the health care or life sciences industry.
* Strong understanding of generative AI and emerging technologies and their business applications.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to explain technical concepts and solutions to non-technical audiences and to influence senior stakeholders and decision makers.
* Strong strategic and analytical thinking skills, with the ability to align technology solutions with business goals and customer needs, and to measure and communicate the value and impact of the solutions.
* Ability to lead cross-functional and vendor teams to a common goal with proven experience in delivering business impact.
* Excellent collaboration and partnership skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional and cross-regional teams, IT partners, and external vendors.
* Strong project management experience, with a track record of successfully delivering large-scale initiatives.
* Strong experience in change management for implementation of new solutions with cross-functional teams and cross-regional teams.
* Strong innovation and learning mindset, with the ability to explore new technologies and approaches, experiment and iterate, and learn from failures and successes.
* Strong ethical and professional standards, with the ability to comply with the data privacy and security policies and regulations.


**Location:** 
 the role is expected to be located in the current country of residence, with local hosting available at a J&J Commercial Innovative Medicine office. Please note that we do not offer relocation for this position.
   

  

 When you
 **submit your application** 
 , please
 **include your CV and your cover letter** 
 that highlights how you have aligned technology with business impact, translating complex concepts into strategic value, and engaged with senior stakeholders.

description:

 An opportunity has been created for a

**Account Executive** 
**- Mulesoft** 
 to join the enterprise sales team. The role will focus on driving expansion in your local market in Sweden. This is an outstanding career opportunity for a sales professional looking to further their career in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**

**What You Will Bring To The Table**

**t** 
 is on a mission to connect the world’s applications, data and devices. $593B is spent each year connecting applications, data and devices, and the challenge is growing spectacularly with the explosion of cloud, big data, mobile and the Internet of Things. We’re “productizing” integration -- making it as easy to connect systems and companies as it is to communicate with friends on Social Media. title: Konsult Microsoft Dynamics 365
description:
**Konsult Dynamics 365**
**Din roll**
 Accelerera din karriär och bli nästa generations konsult inom Microsoft Dynamics 365 för Finance och Supply Chain (AX) & Microsoft Dynamics Customer Engagement (CRM)! Som konsult hos Sogeti kommer du att stötta några av de största, mest älskade varumärkena i Europa på deras digitala transformationsresa.
   

  

**I denna roll kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i:**
* Att arbeta med Microsoft Dynamics, antingen som konsult, superanvändare, processägare eller i samband med implementeringsprojekt.
* Att briljera i rollen som konsult och stötta kunder på deras digitala transformationsresa.
* Att använda din erfarenhet av processkunskap inom finance eller manufacturing för att leverera högkvalitativa lösningar.
* Att bidra till utveckling och implementering av ERP/CRM-system.


**Din profil**
* 2-3 års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet.
* Erfarenhet av processkunskap inom finance eller manufacturing.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Microsoft Dynamics eller annan ERP/CRM-plattform, antingen som konsult, superanvändare, processägare eller i liknande roll.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i samband med en ERP/CRM-implementering.


**Vad vi tror kommer få dig att trivas:**
* Innovativ miljö: Hos oss får du chansen att jobba med den senaste tekniken och vara en del av ett dynamiskt team som älskar att skapa värde genom innovation.
* Karriärutveckling: Vi bryr oss om din framtid och erbjuder utvecklingsprogram och certifieringar i de senaste teknologierna, så att du kan växa och bli den bästa versionen av dig själv.
* Flexibelt arbete: Vi förstår att livet är mer än bara jobb. Därför erbjuder vi möjligheter till distansarbete och flexibla arbetstider för att du ska må bra och trivas.
* Teamkänsla: Vi är som en stor familj med en härlig teamkänsla. Genom att leva efter våra värdeord som mod, passion, laganda och entreprenörskap - skapar vi en arbetsmiljö där alla kan trivas.


**Ansökan**
 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan idag, urval sker löpande! Hoppas vi ses! Vill du veta mer? Kontakta TA Partner Marta Sundell så berättar hon gärna mer.
   

  

**Hej!** 
 Nu när sommaren är här och många av oss njuter av lite välförtjänt ledighet, kan det hända att processen tar lite längre tid än vanligt. Vi återkommer så snart vi är tillbaka från semestern! Tack för ditt tålamod och för att du visat intresse för oss på Sogeti. Vi önskar dig en riktigt härlig sommar fylld med sol, vila och glädje!
   

  

 Sogeti Sverige, en del av Capgemini-koncernen, med 21 kontor och 1300 medarbetare, skapar affärsvärde med teknologi för organisationer som behöver införa innovation snabbt och som vill ha en lokal partner med global skalbarhet. Med en hands-on-kultur och närhet till kunderna, implementerar Sogeti lösningar som hjälper organisationer att arbeta snabbare, bättre och smartare. Genom att kombinera agilitet och snabb implementation via en DevOps-ansats, levererar Sogeti innovativa lösningar inom test- och kvalitetssäkring, molnet och systemutveckling, förstärkta av AI, data och automation.

title: Client Executive - Mid Market
description:
***This job is with WTW, an inclusive employer and a member of myGwork – the largest global platform for the LGBTQ+ business community. Please do not contact the recruiter directly.***
**Description**
 Vill du vara en del av ett starkt team av professionella och kompetenta kollegor? Vi söker nu en erfaren Client Executive med i första hand placering på vårt kontor i Stockholm.
   

  

 Rollen
   

  

 I rollen som Client Executive har du ett eget kundansvar och arbetar med riskrelaterade frågor och försäkringslösningar för dina kunder. Du har en rådgivande roll och är ansvarig för affärsrelationen med dina kunder. Du har ett övergripande ansvar för WTWs leverans, kvalitet och lönsamhet för dina kunder. Du kommer att samarbeta med många av WTWs medarbetare och har WTWs samlade resurser inom risk- och försäkringsområdet till ditt förfogande.
   

  

**Detta Inkluderar Bland Annat Att Du**
* arbetar och ansvarar för dina kunder utifrån ett helhetsperspektiv och utvecklar deras risk- och försäkringshantering
* har löpande kontakt med kund för att säkerställa vår service enligt WTWs servicemodell och process
* ansvarar och följer upp och utvecklar vårt uppdragsavtal med kunden
* samordnar arbetet för hela kundteamet
* är flexibel och agerar professionellt i alla situationer med kunden
* är beredd att lägga tid på att besöka dina kunder regelbundet


 Du erbjuds en spännande roll i ett dynamiskt företag med internationell prägel och bra personliga utvecklingsmöjligheter.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 Om dig
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har gedigen erfarenhet från försäkringsbranschen samt försäljning, kan etablera professionella kontakter och är van vid att möta beslutsfattare på olika nivåer, i olika roller.
   

  

 Du har förmågan att driva hela affärsprocessen och möta beslutsfattare på olika nivåer inom olika verksamheter.
   

  

 Du har minst 5 års erfarenhet inom försäkringsområdet och är van att diskutera risk- och försäkringsrelaterade frågeställningar samt agera som rådgivare. Vi tror att du har högskoleutbildning i juridik, teknik eller ekonomi i kombination med kompletterande utbildning/erfarenhet inom försäkringsområdet eller motsvarande kompetens.
   

  

 Som person är du en lagspelare som är professionell i ditt bemötande. Du är drivande och arbetar prestigelöst och teamorienterat och älskar att vara ute och träffa dina kunder.
   

  

 Då du förväntas att bistå med att hitta och teckna avtal med nya kunder är erfarenhet av försäljning med dokumenterat goda säljresultat meriterande. Vi förutsätter även att du har goda kunskaper i engelska i såväl tal som i skrift. Det är ett krav att du är registrerad förmedlare hos Finansinspektionen.
   

  

 Vi erbjuder
   

  

 Att jobba hos oss är att ansluta sig till ett team med motiverade, passionerade och kompetenta kollegor. Du kan se fram emot att dagarna präglas av att kontinuerligt tillskansa dig ny kunskap och erfarenheter samtidigt som du delar med dig av din egen insikt och erfarenhet. Vi erbjuder en centralt placerad arbetsplats med möjlighet till hybridarbete
   

  

 Hos WTW har vi en positiv anda och en familjär ton. Företaget drivs utifrån ett långsiktigt perspektiv och andas entreprenörskap. Verksamheten präglas av värdeord som bland annat innefattar personlig utveckling, respekt, teamwork och integritet.
   

  

 Om WTW
   

  

 WTW (NASDAQ: WLTW) är ett ledande globalt försäkringsförmedlings-, och konsultbolag. Med rötter tillbaka till 1828 har WTW 47 000 anställda i mer än 140 länder och marknader.
   

  

 Vi är ett globalt företag som genom lokal närvaro och expertis kan erbjuda skräddarsydda lösningar anpassade till kundens risker och behov, lokala trender, marknader och lagstiftning. Genom kompetens, professionalism, engagemang och kundfokus hjälper vi kunder runt om i världen att vända risk till tillväxtmöjligheter.
   

  

 I Sverige är vi idag en av landets ledande rådgivare inom risk- och försäkringsförmedling inom skadeförsäkringsområdet, pensions- och ersättningslösningar och aktuariella tjänster (liv och sak). Vi är cirka 180 medarbetare i Stockholm (HK), Göteborg och Malmö.
   

  

 A career that moves you
   

  

 Equal Opportunity Employer
   

  

 #Hybrid

title: Enterprise Account Executive, Public Sector
company_industry: Software Development and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
**Meet Our Team**
 Join our disruptive evolution of the software industry as a Strategic Account Executive.
   

  

 Every business/industry/company is looking to modernize the way they work. As the recognized industry leader in strategic business applications, according to analysts such as Forrester and Gartner, we challenge companies to rethink the way they do business and empower them to become more efficient, smarter, and most importantly customer centric.
   

  

**Picture Yourself At Pega**
 You will be a thought leader, a true partner and a collaborator with clients seeking to reinvent the way they do business. You will work closely with your clients while you educate and guide them on their Business Process Automation journey. Engage in work that matters and drives true business impact for the world’s largest organizations.
   

  

**What You'll Do At Pega**
* Develop a trusted advisor relationship with multiple stakeholders across the client organization
* Leverage industry and product knowledge to share insights about how a client can maximize license to drive business benefits
* Penetrate new organizations/accounts and radiate new business within existing customer base in assigned portfolio
* Provide insight to the customer as the basis of the commercial conversation, teaching customers something new/valuable about how to compete in their market
* Continuously build and maintain a pipeline of sales activity through prospecting and pipelining using a variety of methods
* Work with Pega’s partners to generate Pega value propositions


**Who You Are**
 A motivated enterprise software sales executive, driven to add value to your clients and their business process automation strategies. You are able to push the customer’s thinking to quickly gain credibility, build a strong relationship and contribute to the success of our clients and Pega.
   

  

**What You've Accomplished**

* 10+ years of direct enterprise software sales experience

* Stable and progressive history of quota achievement

* Knowledge of BPA, DPA, RPA, CRM and Case Management enterprise software solutions
